111.content:
Bowser stewed on his throne, scheming ever greater schemes to win over the Mushroom Kingdom and its lovely ruler. Head resting in his clawed hand, he grumbled as he remembered the two reasons his plans always failed, the red and green monkey wrenches fouling up his works.

Mario and Luigi. "Those pesky plumbers!", he snarled. "They make me sick to my stomach! Every time I try to grab Peach, they get in my way! What do they even get for it? Cake? Pecks on the cheek? She's got that sort of refined charm going on, but... Argh! If only there was some way to get them to stop being so... Persistent..."

The Koopa King mulled thoughts over in his head, before a light went on. "I've got it! I'll make the princess so grotesque to those plumbers, they'll be RELIEVED when I show up to take her away! I've always thought she'd be cuter if she was a bit heavier anyway, and loosened up some... But... I've got to be sneaky about it. Can't have them figuring I'm behind it, or they'll try fixing her first... How should I go about this...?"

1111.content:
"I'll send her some doctored goods! I'm sure that jerk Fawful left some of his garbage here when he converted my castle to a theater... He made that weird Vacuum Mushroom, and those ones that caused the Blorbs, too!"

The titanic turtle leaped off his throne and scrambled to storage, tossing aside henchmen in his haste to locate Fawful's locked-up stash. He hadn't really wanted to mess with the stuff too much before; it was all so hi-tech and weird, he was afraid it'd end up blowing up in his face. But Bowser's enthusiasm overrode his caution, and he approached the iron door in the bowels of his castle, ripped the chains and lock right off of it, and perused the contents of the forbidden storeroom, tossing aside junk.

"Wind-up Fawful chattering teeth... X-ray Glasses permanently stuck at maximum strength so you can't really see anything... Ray guns... Earl guns... Duke guns... Worthless! What a bunch of bunk! ARGH!" Bowser slammed his fist into a stack of crates in front of him, and was rewarded with a crate to the head. After regaining his bearings, he looked to the label of the crate, and grinned a toothy, evil grin.

"Slob Shrooms, huh...?"

---------------------------------------------

The halls of Peach's palace bustled with activity and joviality. The reigning monarch of the Mushroom Kingdom had thrown another party, inviting her closest friends, along with a number of ambassadors and diplomats from neighboring kingdoms. Mario and Luigi hadn't shown up yet, held up by an infestation of boos in their house (engineered by Bowser, unbeknown to anyone). Princess Peach herself was speaking with Daisy and a delegation from Sarasaland, when a Toad came up to her, bearing a gift package wrapped in green and red.

"Pardon my interruption, your Highness! This package just arrived with your name on it! I'm not sure, but I THINK it's from Mario and Luigi! See, cause of the colors." The retainer handed off the gift to Peach, and she delicately opened it. "A present from Mario and Luigi? I wonder what it is?"

As soon as she lifted the cover off of the box, her nostrils were assailed by a pungent, yet strangely alluring odor. Inside the box was a large, somewhat blobby, wobbly dark green mushroom with brown spots, seeping with a slick and oily substance. She picked up the card inside, trying to avoid getting the secretion on her hands.

"'This is a Genuine Lucky Mushroom, from a far-off kingdom. Consider it as a repayment for all of the delicious cakes you've baked us. Sincerely, the Mario Bros.' Oh! How... Um. Nice?" The princess looked warily at the reeking fungus. It looked, quite frankly, disgusting... But something about it made her want to indulge. And it was a gift from the heroes of the Mushroom Kingdom, after all...

Daisy looked at the gift her friend had received, half-jealous and half-relieved. "Uh... Wow. Go on, take a bite Peach! I'm sure it... Well, I hope it tastes better than it looks. It can't be hard, after all."

Peach stared daggers into Daisy, and reluctantly took the jiggling mushroom into her hands. The greasy coating was already staining her gloved fingers. She put her lips to the unctuous shroom and bit off a chunk. The mushroom left her mouth feeling like it was coated in grease, but she also found it extremely, incredibly delicious. Abandoning all pretense of etiquette for the moment, Peach started scarfing it down, smearing musky juices all over her face and lips. The mushroom was gone in the space of ten seconds, Daisy and her delegation the stunned witnesses to the subtle beginning of Peach's transformation. The princess of the Mushroom Kingdom licked her fingers of any remaining juice, loosing a smelly belch that sprayed crumbs of fungus over her guests before regaining her senses, blushing hotly and putting her hands to her mouth.

"Oh... Oh my. I'm sorry... I'm not quite sure what came over me!"

Daisy wiped the crumbs off of her face, and grinned. "It's fine, Peach. I mean, I know I've always been telling you to loosen up some, after all... But maybe scale it back, some." She put an arm around her usually elegant playmate. "This party is kind of dead anyway, without Mario and Luigi. Want to skip out for a bit? Although, if you want to go powder your nose for a bit, that's fine. You've sort of got... A little something there... Yeah, there." Daisy took a kerchief and wiped Peach's face. "Got it."

Peach thought about it. Her head was feeling a little muzzy...
1111.title: Beware of Reek-Bearing Gifts

11112.content:
“Sure, Daisy, let’s go.” Peach said.

“Great. You want to lead the way?” Daisy motioned toward the exit.

The two princesses walked out of the palace. Surprisingly, no one took notice to this as they were too busy engaging in drawn-out conversations and small yet delectable hors d'oeuvres. When Peach and Daisy were outside, the blonde was asked a question regarding her gift.

“So, Peach, do you really think that Luigi and Mario sent you that mushroom?”

“Well, yes. Who else would send me a present in a box with those colors?”

“Maybe someone who wanted to prank you by making you think that our boyfriends gave you a bad gift.” Daisy said.

“I don’t think that the mushroom was bad.” Peach said defensively.

“Really. After what that thing made you do when you basically stuffed it down your throat.” Daisy said with folded arms.

“I’ll admit that it was odd that I just lost control of myself after eating the Genuine Lucky Mushroom, but at least it was nothing too embarrassing.”

“Yeah, burping loudly in front of people isn’t embarrassing at all.” Daisy replied in playful sarcasm.

“Like you’re one to talk, Miss ‘5 time Top Belcher in Sarasaland’.” Peach shot back with a blush.

Now the brunette’s face lit up with a red hue.

“Okay, I’ll give you that. But a kingdom-sponsored public burping contest isn’t the same as an upper-class party.” Daisy said.

“Right. So, what do you want to do?”

“Personally, I want to find out where that mushroom came from, because I doubt our resident heroes would give you something like that.” Daisy said.

“Then who do you think would?” Peach asked.

“There are a lot of people who would. Wario, Waluigi, Bowser…” Daisy listed off some possible gift-givers on her fingers.

“Just to be sure, we should go find Mario and Luigi and see if they did give it to me.”

“Fine. Let’s go.” Daisy agreed.


After a few minutes, Daisy and Peach arrived at the house of the Mario Bros. However, when they got there, they saw that the red and green clad heroes were fighting off a boo infestation. After they stopped it, they noticed their girlfriends at the door.

“Hello, Peach and Daisy.” Mario greeted them.

“Hi, Mario and Luigi.” Peach greeted in return.

“What brings you here? Aren’t you two supposed to be at a big party?”

“Yeah, but I decided to bring Peach here because of a gift that she thinks you gave her.” Daisy explained.

“What gift?” Luigi asked.

Princess Peach pulled out the red and green box that was filled with grease.

“This had a special mushroom inside called the Genuine Lucky Mushroom. There’s a note in here that says that you gave it to me.” Peach said as she handed Mario the note and he examined it.

“I’m-a sorry, Princess, but we couldn’t have sent you the mushroom. As you’ve most likely noticed, we’ve been preoccupied with an assault from several boos.”

Daisy and Peach entered the house and saw that it was thoroughly trashed. Furniture was on its side, and appliances were smashed. The two royal figures were shocked by the interior, to say the least.

“Oh my. I’m sorry that this happened to you two.” Peach apologized.

“It’s all right. What did the mushroom look like?’ Mario asked.

“It was blobby looking, it smelled badly, and it was green and brown.” Daisy described.

“Oh no, that’s the description of a Slob Shroom!”

“What’s a ‘Slob Shroom’?” Peach asked.

“It’s a disgusting kind of mushroom that alters the personality of anyone who eats it. Did either of you eat it?” Mario asked.

Daisy and Peach gave each other a scared look.

“Um… I did. ~*BBBBUUUUUURRRRPPPPPPP!*~” Peach answered sheepishly before emitting a repugnant belch that lasted four seconds.

“Oh, no.”

“How do we stop it from changing me?” Peach asked.

“The only cure is the Clean Shroom. It can make anyone who eats it act well-mannered and active. It is located in Bowser’s Castle.” Luigi explained.

“So, we have to deal with him, then?” Daisy stated.

“Fine, we’ll find him and get that Clean Shroom.” Peach declared.

“Should we join you?” Mario asked.

“No, we’ll be fine.” Daisy assured.

And so, the two princesses set off to find the Koopa King and get Peach back to normal.

Wendy brought her foot down on the shell and kicked the Koopa across the room and out the door. "I'M much more important than him! And tons cuter, too! Why shouldn't I be involved in Daddy's plans?! That stupid little twerp Bowser Jr. gets all the attention now, and I'm sick of it! IT'S NOT FAIR!"

In the adjoining hall, Iggy and Ludwig ducked their heads as Wendy's attendant went sailing over and skidded through the hall like a runaway train. "It appears our dear sister is in a mood, Iggy. Hopefully she'll be too clouded with anger to think hard about our proposal."

Iggy nodded, grinning mischievously. "I don't think that'll be a problem. She's never really been the thinking sort! Man, this is gonna be the best prank-slash-experiment ever!"

The siblings went in. "Hello, dear sister!", began Ludwig in his most cloying voice. "How are you this fine day?"

"STUFF IT, MOPHEAD! I'm not in the mood for your dumb concertos!"

Ludwig clenched his teeth and kept plowing through. "Ah! I'm not here about my symphonies, but I think you'll find my proposal music to your ears. You're tired of Junior hogging the spotlight, yes?"

"Yeah? What about it?!", scowled Wendy.

"What if I told you I had a way to bring that spotlight to you?"

Wendy narrowed her eyes. "I'd be suspicious, quite frankly. What are you getting at?"

Iggy took center stage. "Me and Luddy have been working on something that'll make SURE you get all the attention you can stand! You'll have so much presence, there won't be room in the castle for anything else! You'll be bigger than Junior ever was!"

Wendy sat back in her chair and closed her eyes, thinking. "What is it?"

Ludwig and Iggy grinned. They had the hook in her.
1143.title: Ludwig and Iggy's Big Idea

choices: A dungeon that looked like it hadn't been used for eons
11433.content:
Pulling out a pair of wands from behind their backs, Wendy started to get up from her chair in anticipation. "No sis- it's probably better if you're sitting down for this!" Iggy calls out, the two twirling their wands around mumbling a few words under their breath as they stare fixated at an empty spot on the floor. "Is this going to take long?! I have better things to do you then just watch you two dingbats fail at some rudimentary magic!" Her face starting to scrunch up from her curiosity at just what her two brothers were planning, Wendy piped up with another question

"What sort of spell are you doing anyway? You don't even seem to be aiming at any-YEOW!" Before Wendy knew it, both her brothers suddenly finished casting their spells at their intended target... Right at her! Slammed so far down into her pink chair it snaps, Wendy makes little effort to compose herself as she gets ready to lay it on Iggy and Ludwig. "OOOO, THAT WAS MY FAVORITE CHAIR! I'LL GET YOU TWO IDIOTS FOR THIS!!!" quickly pulling herself in a flurry of feathers and ripped fabric from the chair's soft cushioning the spell had wedged her into, Wendy picked up a few odd pieces of trash surrounding it and started pegging them at Iggy and Ludwig, who broke out into a terrified run.

"Hey maestro, what happened to that stupid prank spell of yours!? Unless it was just getting Wendy to go nuttier then usual- OW!" Trying their best to avoid Wendy's projectiles as they ducked in and out of their father's castle's many different hallways and secret passages, Ludwig struggled to respond from exhaustion. "Well if anybody screwed it up... *Pant* It was YOU, you imbecile! *Gasp* Honestly... I'm working with an amateur here..." Still running, the two slowly stop as they reach a dead end. "Oh boy, we're really in for it now! Maybe she'll let up on me if I tell her it was YOUR idea... Actually, where IS Wendy?" Turning around, they notice their spoiled sister was nowhere to be found. "... Now that I think about it, Wendy stopped chasing us awhile ago Iggy; I thought it was getting strangely quiet without her screeching from behind us!" "I find it stranger considering she'll almost never let anything go if she can help it!" Shrugging to each other, the two tip-toed off to the relative safety of their bedroom chambers.

Meanwhile, Wendy had found herself one moment chasing her brothers out of bloodthirsty-revenge, to being completely and utterly lost. "Well this bites! First time I get lost in this place and it's when I've got a pair of losers I need to pummel!" Wendy moaned to herself, walking around the dusty old hallway she'd wound up in. Before long, she heard her stomach start to audibly growl. "Darn it, and now I'm hungry! Princesses shouldn't have to put up with this treatment from their underling brothers!" Yet before she could start complaining to herself some more, she started to smell the faint scent of food. As she started to instinctively follow the scent using her nose, Wendy hadn't noticed an ever-so-slight amount of drool had started to leak out of her large lips, nor that the closer she got to the source, the more her mind was clouded with thoughts of stuffing her face and little else. Wendy may have gone overboard with most of whatever she did, but even she wasn't usually THIS obsessed with food.

Finally reaching an old wooden door that with a little pushing from Wendy gave way, she found...
11433.title: Backfired Prank

114331.content:
Wendy had never seen a chamber like the one that stretched out before her. It seemed like a library, save that instead of books it had burgers. Replacing the codices was cake. And where there should have been folios, there were french fries. The shelves of the cavernous chamber seemed to be stocked with heaping amounts of every stripe and color of greasy, sugary, and unhealthy foodstuff known to Koopakind. There were some comfortable looking chairs and tables too, but being inedible these did not draw nearly as much attention. The sheer spectacle of it was heart-stopping in the figurative sense, and would probably prove to be heart-stopping in the literal sense. Wendy found herself licking her plump lips, fat tendrils of saliva dangling from her mouth. She'd been whiling her days away in the castle for a long time... But she'd never noticed this place before.

"Hohon? Hwat is zis? A guest! Magnifique!"

Wendy shook herself from her stupor, wiping away the rather unprincess-like drool that had formed on her mouth. "Who said that?! Get out here!"

An ethereal shape took form in front of her. It appeared to be a Boo, blue in color, wielding a frying pan and wearing a chef's hat. "Bonjour, Mademoiselle! I am Cordon Boo! Eet iz SUCH a pleasure to see you!"

Wendy just stared at the spectral chef. "What's with the overwrought French accent?!"

"Hwat accent?"

Wendy immediately slapped the Boo upside the head with her wand. The Boo rubbed the spot tenderly. "Ow! Sorry, sorry! It's expected! of me!"

"Quit clowning around and listen! I'm hungry! STARVING. I don't know why, and I don't care! I'm going to start "generously sampling" your wares here, so don't even try to stop me! My Daddy's the king, and he'll wreck you if you do!"

Cordon Boo looked hurt. "I wouldn't think of it! I've been waiting forever for someone to come by and eat my food! You can't imagine how hard it is to be a chef with no customers! And I can't feed my waitstaff, because they're all ghosts! I'm just lucky it never goes bad..."

"Waitstaff?! What the heck are they waiting for? They should be waiting on ME! Tell them I want everything of everything, with EXTRA EVERYTHING. And don't skimp on the portions!" Wendy tore a massive drumstick off of a nearby turkey and jammed the greasy, meaty morsel into her mouth, suckling at the crispy golden brown skin noisily with her lips and shucking it off entirely, crunching it in her mouth as she sat down, making sure there was always something in arm's reach.
114331.title: IT BEGINS.

115.title: Decisions, Decisions

1152.content:
In her island fortress of Syrup Castle, the leader of the Black Sugar Pirates sat upon her throne of pilfered gold, looking like the cat that ate the canary. Life had been good for her, especially since she'd conned the Bottomless Coin Sack from Wario. The pirate queen lived the high life from that point on, rebuilding her old digs three times as large and a million times as luxurious. One could say that she never wanted for anything, but the problem with Captain Syrup was that she always wanted more, and in that respect she was much like Wario. The similarity stopped there, however. Syrup was a cunning foe, as beautiful as she was devious. Wario was... Wario.

She grinned as she thought of Wario. She liked the crude, greedy man, but she liked his treasure more. Still, she hoped he wasn't TOO sore about her swiping the Bottomless Coin Sack. He'd proven to give as good as he'd got in the past, and the last thing Syrup wanted was him thrashing through Kitchen Island hellbent on taking his treasure back with interest.

At that moment, one of her Goom henchmen came waddling in, bearing a huge wrapped gift. The red-haired rogue perked up immediately. "What's this, henchman? Something from an admirer?" she inquired.

The Goom set down the box in front of her. "Appears to be from that purple-pants guy you're always messing with, Captain!"

A present? From Wario? So soon after she'd made a fool of him and stolen his treasure? Best to let the expendable henchman open it, just in case it proved to be a bomb or some other nasty surprise. "Open it, henchman."

The Goom did as he was bidden. The inside of the box was a mess of dunnage, wads of paper overflowing onto the floor. The hapless swabbie dove in, rustling around for a few minutes before extricating himself with a tiny box and a letter. "Found it, Captain! Apologies for the delay!"

"Don't just stand there, bring it here!" Wario's lamentable lack of eco-friendly packaging technique was the last thing on Syrup's mind as the Goom trundled over, handing the contents of the giftbox over. Her eyes scanned over the paper as she read aloud.

"Dear Syrup; I'm really sick of you stealing my stuff all the time! Don't get too comfortable just laying around while others do the work, or you'll really regret it! But to show that I'm not TOO angry with you, here's a present. I think it'll really bring us closer together. Have a rotten day, Wario."

'...Interesting. I wonder what it is." The nautical nymph opened the small box, revealing a golden band studded with precious stones. The ring was on her finger five seconds after she opened the box. "How wonderful! I'll have to steal from him more often!"

Just then, Syrup...
1152.title: A Pirate's Life For Me

choices: She set right onto the next dish,, still hungry.
She ordered her minions to handfeed her.
11522.content:
A great grumbling erupted from Captain Syrup's stomach, echoing around the great hall. The pirate queen blushed as the noise subsided, brought to a low gurgle.

"Henchman!", the plunderer in purple barked, "Henchman! I'm hungry! Tell the cooks to prepare dinner. Or, no, a feast! But just a light one, I've got to keep my girlish figure. No, wait, I work hard, I need to eat to keep up my strength! Make it a big one, the biggest! Just tell the cooks to keep doing their thing until I tell them to stop. What are you waiting for, henchman?! Get going!"

The feisty freebooter crumpled up Wario's letter and chucked it at the fleeing Goom, off to relay his mistress's orders and to belay her wrath. Syrup leaned back in her throne, grinning as she admired her new ring. It was a little gaudy, but it was a pirate's right to be as gaudy as possible. Something about it unnerved her, though, a feature that she'd overlooked in her rush to put on the gift. There appeared to be the head of a pig adorning the band, a ruby stuffed in its mouth, emulating an apple. Somewhat tasteless, but still, treasure was treasure. And what more could she expect from Wario? The captain waited impatiently for her meal. She didn't know why she was so hungry all of a sudden, but the cause of her hunger wasn't as important to her as the satiation of it. After what seemed like an eternity to her, the tiny pink mole creatures that served as the cooks of the Black Sugar Pirates began to wheel out her ordered meal. Syrup grabbed a platter at random, and was rewarded with a heaping pile of spaghetti and meatballs, dripping with sauce. The greedy pirate grabbed a fork and twirled a huge wad of it up, jamming it into her mouth and smearing sauce all over her face in the process. She took another fork and ate hand-over-fist, until the contents of her plate were either staining her face and clothing or digesting in her distended gut. The pirate queen shifted in her throne, rubbing her stomach and loosing a smelly belch that made her eariler gastrointestinal grumblings sound like a dropping pin in comparison. She closed her eyes and licked the sauce sloppily off of her lips, leaving them wet with her saliva as she considered her next course of action.
11522.title: A Rapacious Repast

11532.content: It was just another boring day at Diamond city for the young witch Ashley. Lately she had been getting so board with her life that she even stopped practicing magic. Of course, there wasn't much for her to do around her house other than practice magic, so she decided to look through a book of spells and found something that interested her, a spell that let her switch lives with other people. At first, she didn't really care, but then she remembered her old magic school rival, Princess Wendy O. Koopa. "hmm... Princess don't have to do much." thought the 15 year old witch, she then got a sly smile on her face "all they have to do is sit around on their throne and tell others to do stuff for them. Plus Wendy can use magic too, so if I don't like her life, I can always switch back. It's perfect!" Ashley grabbed a phone book and called Wendy over for a visit. She then immediately began preparing her master plan. Soon Wendy arrived, she was a slightly pudgy girl, but all koopas are pudgy, so it didn't bother her. Wendy looked at Ashley who waved to her happily. "Oh hey Ashley. That you? wow, you actually grew" Said the smug Koopa princess, Ashley had always had a growth problem, which was the reason she began practicing her magic. "Oh.... Wendy.... you.... look... great." Lied the young witch, forcing herself to smile. Truthfully, she couldnt stand to even look at Wendy, but Ashley was determined to get the easy life of a Koopa Princess. "Say Wendy" said the young witch "want to see a new spell I learned?" Wendy just scoffed and looked at Ashley "sure, its not like I got anything better to do." Wendy couldn't figure out why Ashley was being so nice, but she never got the chance to realize what had happened, Ashley casted the spell and both girls were blinded in a white light. When Ashley woke up, she saw she was in a very royal princess like room, except the colors were black instead of Pink. Ashley's spell worked. Ashley looked in the mirror and saw....

1153211.content:
Patting her stuffed belly after she'd just wolfed down her fourth greasy burger, Ashley was starting to get used to her new slothful lifestyle. Wiggling her butt further into the enormous throne she'd been binging away in for the past few hours, the slothful witch girl started to contemplate her situation while she wolfed down some sugary donuts.

"So being a royal *GULP!* koopa princess and all, I have- *Urrrrrrrrp!* ('scuse me!) an entire castle to myself? And all you- *Frrrrpppptttttt~* (Man that was a big one~) slaves to boss around? I should've swapped places with that Wendy brat ages ago!" Slowly pulling herself off her grand chair and watching her developing potbelly jiggle a bit, Ashley took a few sniffs. "Hmmm, I'm certainly stinking the place out a bit... So princesses have something like a jacuzzi, or an enormous swimming-pool bath, right?" She asked the nearest koopa guard, taking some cruel satisfaction at her stench causing him to gag. "Yes, y-y-y-your m-mmajesty! *Cough* There's a queen-sized h-h-hhot-tub on the t-t-t-ttop floorrrrruugh-" As he fell unconscious from the witch girl's rank BO, Ashely merely shrugged and while scratching her sweaty rear-end with one hand, pulled a waitress goomba cleaning up her previous binge in front of her. "Hey, small-fry~" Ashley cooed, again grinning as see saw beads of sweat starting to form on the teenage girl's forehead as she farted away in the background. "Better not slack off like this last guy while I'm saying this! Now, I want my royal hot tub to get filled up with nothing but rich, melted chocolate! Heck, I want it to be topped off with a ton of whipped cream and candy for me to snack on, and I want it done in the next ten minutes orrrrrr-" Slowly lifting her leg, Ashley gave a wink to the now terrified girl "*PrrrrffffffftttttttttttSPLAT!* I'll make sure you'll be the girl washing the tights I've just spent keeping nice and pungent! Off you go sweetie, your royal princess of whatever-land commands you!"

Grabbing a few more donuts and scarfing them down, Ashley started to waddle out the kitchen and back to her bedroom. "Oh man, being a princess rocks{/i)! Though I might want to start enforcing a strict girls-only policy for my staff, heh."

-----

Meanwhile, Wendy was finding life living in Ashley's huge, mostly decrepit mansion decidedly less fun.

"Ugh, this BITES! I should've put a hit on that witch dweeb years ago to stop her pulling THIS kind of stunt on me!" Wendy snarled as she rummaged through what was once Ashley's bedroom, finding little else besides obscure potion ingredients, torn clothes and the occasional half-eaten sandwich. "Doesn't help that I had to trade my hundreds of servants for whatever sort of thing YOU'RE meant to be! Ooooooh, when I get myself out of this..." the pudgy koopa girl pouted as she pointed at Red, who was quite confused as to why his master was suddenly much more... Reptilian in appearance. He couldn't tell much of a difference from Ashley's personality to this new character's however. "Eh, master? Why are you ransacking your own bedrooooom-*ACK!*"

Grabbing him by his small neck, Wendy started to unload her frustration on the red demon-creature. "Look, pipsqueak! I know that nerdy girl of yours like all creepy witches probably has some sort of 'aaaalll-powerful' spellbook she uses every time she wants to terrorize the neighbourhood or move over on someone else's turf, and I bet she's too thick to realize it's still lying around here! Once I find that book, I just read out the counter spell and everything's back to normal... Aaaand then I capture her, publicly humiliate her and keep her as some sort of adorable, geeky human pet. Any questions, or are you going to help!?" Barely able to breath, Red slowly responded. "I know... Where.... *gasp* where this 'book' is... Just... Put me down... Pleeeeease..." Placing him down and tapping her foot from a lack of patience, Red quickly scuttled underneath Ashley's bed and produced a large book. "Bingo! At least you're smarter than my servants are-Hang on you moron, this isn't a spell book..." As she sat up on the bed started to flick through the pages, Wendy's eyes lit up and a cruel smile grew on her face. "It's her DIARY! Oooooh, the humiliating secrets a socially-awkward dork like her must've confided into this book... Boy, I am going to unleash a world of hurt on this girl by the time I'm done reading this thing~."

----

"CANNONBAAAAALL~!"

Wearing only a tight-fitting bikini, Ashley jumped into the towering chocolate monstrosity that was supposed to be her bath with a large splash, slurping up the confectionary goodness she was submerged in as she swam around. Swallowing mouthful of the thick, sticky fluid, Ashley let out a few small farts just to watch the yellow balls of gas float to the top of her chocolate pool with mild amusement. When she'd eaten enough to put even Wendy to shame, she lout out a personal-best of a burp, echoing all throughout the room. "*BRRRUUUUAAAAAP!"Ashely stood up and waddled over to the side of the large tub and started to lick over her slowly growing arms, looking around just to see the room mostly abandoned (likely due to her horrible scent), besides the still anxious looking goomba girl from earlier. Turning around and facing the teenager, who despite being obligated to watch over Ashley during her bath was keeping her distance from the human fart-machine, the witch princess leered over the edge and flashed her a large, food-covered grin. "Hey small-stuff, you did a pretty good job with this big bath sundae of mine! Maybe I oughta make you some sort've advisor or something, I can see us getting together reeeeally well~" "Eh, thanks, your royal-ness! But I think there's like, a high-ranking magikoopa who's meant to have that role-" "Pfffft, I don't want some old guy telling me what to do! I want people my age! Heck, why are there mostly guy... Eh, turtle and mushroom people here? I'd be having A LOT more fun with girls like yourself looking after me! That's an idea...." Ashley started to muse to herself as she sucked on a chocolate-covered finger.

"Hey, goomba-chick! Tell everybody who isn't a chick that works here that I'm firing them! Then start hiring for girls only, preferably my age... Hell, just go to a high school and kidnap a whole bunch of teenagers I can oogle! Oooooo, it feels nice not having to hold back now!" Ashley cried out as she let out enough farts to turn her chocolate hot tub into a bubble-bath.

124.content:
Before we get underway, we should determine the cause of Tron's onset slobby-ness.
==================

Path 1 - Over dependence on the Servbots.
The inevitability of having little mechanical servants; laziness, over abundance of snacks, lack of exercise, and general feeling of bliss. Given how much of a slave-driver Tron is made out to be, it comes as no surprise that she would end up like this.

Path 2 - Experiment gone wrong.
Picture this: Tron Bonne gets some reconnaissance that informs her that Megaman goes for women with big breasts(possibly with Roll having newly/massively grown breasts), and Tron tries to concoct a formula that would make her chest grow a couple cup-sizes over night. The formula would work by increasing the flow of fat into her breasts(as well as making the fat firm and perky), only the formula is messed up by a servbot, and instead of increasing the flow of fat to her chest, it goes south, and instead of firm and perky, it's soft and squishy.

Path 3 - Wild card
AKA, make up you're own path.

1241.content:
In story and popular culture, it seems like everyone agrees that over-reliance on mechanical devices(be them computers, robots, or vehicles) will ultimately lead to slothful life-styles and the such.

Now, the young Miss Tron Bonne will learn this lesson for herself, but will she actually learn, or will she be seduced by sloth and gluttony?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------
Alright, enough with me trying to play the all-knowing narrator, I realized that there are actually three paths this story can start from.

1 ~ It starts off at the end of Megaman Legends, the Bonne family have enough riches to live their lives peacefully(what with that giant refractor shard they found in the final dungeon), so after having her fill of a pirate's life Tron decides to live it up in the lap of luxury, her servbots start to wait on her hand-and-foot, and she tries to resist her new-found lazy life.

2 ~ Same as the first option, but about three-or-so months into her new life-style, where she has let herself go a bit(going up about fifteen-or-so pounds), and is starting to get addicted to over-eating and having forty little servants tend to her every need.

3 ~ You can probably either use the first two ideas as a jumping point, or you can just come up with your own scenario for her that would cause her to grow to such an immense size(please, let us not have this devolve into a "ZOMG she weighted 60000000 tons" crapfest, let's put an upper-limit of 600 pounds, and a lower-limit of 250 pounds).

141.content:
Etna was not having a good month. Laharl had not seen the need to leave his castle in over a month, and that meant he was constantly haranguing anyone within earshot, if not to get some mundane task, then to just have an outlet for his extremely pushy and obnoxious temper. On top of that, his perpetual presence in the castle made it particularly hard for Etna to shirk her duties or plot for a way to gather a little power herself; becoming a tyrannical dictator was an absolute treat of a thought for her. Hardly in a place to make a power-grab, Etna had ridden out the past few weeks dictating most of her work to her Prinny soldiers and giving Laharl as hard a time as she could without directly disobeying him to encourage his attention to move elsewhere.

One morning as Etna trudged down the hallway towards Laharl's throne room, she heard a bit more commotion than usual outside the castle. She took a peek outside through one of the large, gothic windows in the hallway, observed the commotion, and remarked to no one in particular in her bossy tone:
141.title: Etna

1411.content:
Etna's eyes grew as wide as saucers. A redheaded, youngish looking girl with red eyes and a flowing white robe was being attacked by some of Laharl's castle guards. The girl reminded her of Flonne, and seemed to be dressed similarly. However, one difference between the two was immediately clear: she weighed nearly a ton! It was amazing that her colossal legs even carried her weight, yet she moved as if she didn't have the slightest trouble. The guards were attempting to drive her back with spears and swords, but it looked like every time the soldiers landed a blow, a brief, greenish haze would materialize between the weapon and the angel-looking girl, rendering the blow apparently ineffective. The girl herself seemed rather panicked, and seemed to be trying to apologize to the guards. Eventually she turned and began walking away from the castle. The guards seemed visibly relieved; if she had wanted to move forward, they probably wouldn't have stopped her. Etna was ready to write the encounter off as one of the many strange events that occurred in the netherworld on a daily basis, when she saw the girl produce a small staff from her robe as she walked away and pointed it at a nearby hill. The affected ground seemed to shake, then violently crack and collapse into flat land.

Etna wanted that wand.

------

"Hey, you! Fatso!" Etna growled, a little out of breath from her run down from the castle.
The redheaded angel turned with a worried expression.
"Yes?"

"What's your deal? And where did you get that wand?" Etna crossed her arms and waited for a response.
"My name is Sellipheluma...you can call me Selly if you wish....is this the netherworld?"
Etna snorted. Where did she think she was, Hawaii?

"Yeah, this is the Netherworld, has fat begun to leak into your skull? How could you not know that?" Etna questioned.


"Oh dear...Its official....I'm a fallen angel!" Selly seemed on the verge of tears.
Etna raised an eyebrow.

"You see, I didn't used to look like this, I was an angel in charge of celestial information gathering; I was always trying to be the fastest to get our leaders information, and I guess I got a little too competitive....I so loved the praise I received for my good work, that I may have sabatoged one or two of my peers to keep my high standing....I didn't think it was a big deal! I could do their work and my own and still be faster than they were, but the higher Seraphim just wouldn't listen! I just wanted a chance to show them how hard I was working....I woke up here today...my punishment must be time in the netherworld and becoming the opposite of what I was trying to obtain..."

Etna laughed. "What'd you do, tape a dumbbell to another angel's wings or something? Anyway, I don't really care, just fork over that wand that can blow up mountains!"

Selly gave a sad smile. "Oh no, that's just a hunk of wood. All of my angelic powers have been taken away, now all I've got is the demonic power of sloth...I need a wand to properly focus it." She sighed sadly, then scoffed sarcastically, "Or maybe someone will want to take my burden off my hands...tch...."

Etna shook her head to make sure she heard correctly. "You can GIVE that power away?!"
Selly nodded, her chins shaking. "Of course. There's nothing more deplorable than power, especially one so closely linked to sloth. If I wasn't angelic, I don't know what kind of tyrant I would become, or how easily this energy could warp my body and mind...."

"Umm, if I can blow up a mountain like that, I'll take it! Now!" Etna was already having sweet dreams off making Laharl's throne launch like a rocket out the top of the castle.

"You WANT it?! This is my punishment!....but....maybe I could fly again if I lost some of this slothful energy........Look, I can't give it all to you at once, you'd explode, most likely. This is going to change you, and I want to make sure you are not going to regret this. So here."

She placed a hand on Etna's head, and a brief green spark appeared at the site of contact. Etna could have swore Selly's generous belly receded ever so slightly when it happened. Etna felt as if she received an electric shock, and even after the dizziness passed she felt kind of tired and rather hungry.

"Come back in a day's time if you really want more....though I doubt it." Selly said.

"Why don't I feel stronger?" Etna demanded. "I just feel sleepy!"
"It takes time to work through your system...you'll feel it soon enough."

"Like a potion, huh?" Etna grinned.
"Like poison." Selly sighed.
1411.title: "Who the heck is that?"

choices: She heads right back to Selly!
14111.content:
Etna's eyes opened lazily and darted to the clock. She had overslept by almost two hours. As she tried to account for her abnormal tiredness, she realized she hadn't felt this refreshed in ages. She almost felt intoxicated with good vibes. She pointed at a decorative urn in her room and watched with amazement as the ice spell she tried to cast materialized with almost no concentration or mental exhaustion, obliterating the vase with diamond-sharp ice. Etna felt like she could take on the world!....until she got to her feet. She suddenly felt a little nauseous, and her shoulders got the slightest bit achy. She plopped back down into her bed and the good vibes immediately returned. She slept another hour, and would have gone for longer, but her growling stomach rudely awakened her.

"Tch...guess a trip to the kitchen is worth the headache." She got to her feet, this time ready for the mild feeling of discomfort. She glanced at herself in the mirror, and her eyes widened. She was kind of chunky! Her belly was now a soft little dome that squished into the waistband of her shirt. She realized she had less mobility in her skirt; her thighs had softened, and Etna was worried that if she had gained just a few more pounds, her butt would be too big to cover with her skirt. Her face was rounder, and her breasts seemed ever so slightly bigger; only someone with treated them with as much scrutiny as Etna would notice, however. She seemed less concerned about her weight gain and more than more didn't go to her chest. "I would have hoped the whole lardo effect was only for that angel girl, but If this process is going to make me a fatass, it better not take the phrase literally and shove a little blubber into my chest!" Etna scowled.

----

"More, more, MORE!" Do you not understand the word? M-O-R-E!" Etna had discarded her fork for her third plate of pancakes and tore into them with her hands, letting butter and syrup cascade over them. Her prinny chefs were desperately trying to keep up with her appetite.Bite after bite sent a sticky river dripping down her chin and onto her skirt. She felt her skirt digging deeper into her waist as her gut became packed with food even as it growled in want of more sustenance. She killed another two plates, wiped her hands on her skirt, and threatened to use her new-found magical aptitude to have prinny for lunch if she wasn't brought chocolate to round out the meal as soon as possible. Ever since she sat down to eat, her discomfort had vanished, and the second food touched her lips she realized how hungry she was. Her weight gain was in the back of her mind as she demanded more food, but her desire to eat was overwhelming.
14111.title: The next morning.

choices: Etna wakes up to survey her new powers and bodily changes.
141112.content:
After breakfast, Etna ran from the castle in an attempt to find Selly once again. Her jog made the strange feeling of discomfort that hung over her intensify, but she didn't care; she needed to find her and get more power! Etna hated exertion, however, and her rear end was kind of chafing in her leather skirt now that it was pressing so tightly against it. She could feel the extra flesh jiggling from her momentum. Strangely enough, Selly was right where Etna had left her! She seemed to have either obtained or conjured a pile of pillows, and was lounging on them lazily. Her eyes lit up when she saw Etna.

"You aren't back for more, are you?" She asked hopefully.
"Of course I am! I barely need to focus to cast spells I know now! Gimme all of it this time!" Etna grinned and rubbed her hands together.
"I still don't see how you could possibly enjoy lazing around all day while using magic and coercion to cheat your way to everything you need! Look at me, I haven't done any work in a day now, I truly am in hell!" Selly sighed and lifted a titanic breast a little with both hands, as if it's weight demonstrated the severity of her inertia.

Etna, restraining the urge to assault the flabby angel for her stupidity, realized she could only benefit from keeping her cool. "Yeah yeah, so terrible. Gimme another dose!"

-----
Etna returned to the castle a few hours later with blueberry sauce smeared around her mouth. She leisurely strolled in towards her room, licking her fingers, when she was stopped by a fuming Laharl. "Where the heck have you been?! I should have you executed for this!"

Etna yawned. "I would have been back earlier, but I saw this goblin selling pies, and next thing I knew I had killed a few hours! Sue me! I'm gonna go take a nap."
Laharl's jaw clenched before he began his next torrent of threats. "If you set foot into your room before giving me a full report I'll watch as y.....your ass is getting HUGE! What are you doing, eating members of my court?! Quickly, have everyone report in for attendance!" Laharl shouted after the placidly advancing Etna.
141112.title: She heads right back to Selly!

El Fuerte, for his part, was certain that he was close to perfecting the "food of champions" that was his Holy Grail, and was quite eager to have his idol sample his creations. Mika, for her part, didn't exactly complain about the free food.

This was her second day with the masked chef, and she was currently sitting at the counter of his new restaurant, devouring a large bowl of chili con carne. The spicy, saucy dish stained her lips and face as she lost herself in the meal. Whatever the feisty luchadore had learned about his other craft was nothing less than a miracle. Something about El Fuerte's new style of cooking was simply too divine to resist, despite some of the horror stories she'd heard about it. One bowl turned to two, then three before the voluptuous street fighter decided she'd had enough. Rubbing her distended belly, she turned her stool around and leaned against the counter.

"That was really... Just, really good! I've never had such good food! But... Ugh... I think I overdid it."

El Fuerte peeked out from the kitchen...

1532.content:
Felicia mewled, sighing as she looked at the latest reviews of her CDs. She had enjoyed a few years of popularity, some of her records reaching platinum status, but even the novelty of having a catwoman as a pop singer wore off after a time.

She sighed again, running a white furred paw through her huge mane of blue hair. Her ears twitched slightly, and she shook her head, smiling.

“Ah well… At least I got enough money in to live comfortably…” she said.

Which was true. Her records, her concerts, her merchandise, all of it had given her so much money that she didn’t have to work a day in her life ever again. She had a modest mansion on the outskirts of the city and some loyal employees (she didn’t like the word ‘servants’) that didn’t mind the fact that she wasn’t human. The orphanages and animal shelters she had started were thriving, making sure that abandoned youngsters and pets of all ages found good, loving homes. She still had many fans, but most of her target audience, young girls, had moved on to the next big artist, each more superficial than the last.

Felicia sighed. She didn’t have to work, but she wanted to. It helped get over the depression she felt.

Her first orphanage, Felicity House, had been run by Felicia herself. She had taken all the vows of a nun, but because she wasn’t human, the pope had disavowed her, refusing to acknowledge her as a nun and excommunicating her. It had been loudly contested by the church that raised her, as well as her lawyers, but the papacy wasn’t hearing of it.

Felicia mewled softly, idly fiddling with her tail.

She did have another option, but she wasn’t very happy with it.

Jedah was still around. Jon Talbain, her sometimes lover, had vowed to fight the so-called Dark Messiah. She could go find him… but she found fighting abhorrent, save for just friendly exercise or fighting to save someone she cared about. And Majigen, Jedah’s realm, was nearly constant fighting. To say nothing of the Dark Hunters that stalked that place. Donovan respected that she wasn’t a threat to humanity and left her alone, and Hsien-Ko and her sister were Felicia’s friends, but Baby Bonnie Hood was a fucking psycho who had vowed to have Felicia’s pelt as a jacket.

Felicia shivered.

She was BOOOORRREED… She had already checked up on her various businesses, her agent still didn’t have anything for her, she had already checked her stocks and sold the ones that were in danger of falling, and she really didn’t want to risk meeting up with B.B. Hood or even worse, Lord Raptor. Hsien-Ko had warned her that the zombie was a ravening bloodthirsty lunatic who went hump-crazy whenever he saw some female he liked. It was only by rampant mauling of the zombie’s genitals that she was able to escape being raped the first time. (He behaved himself and just flirted with her since then, his testicles regenerating.)

Felicia yawned, and stretched. It was getting late. Maybe she should get something to eat?

She picked up the phone and called her kitchen. The chef there, Alphonse, picked up.

“Yes, Miss Felicia?” Alphonse said.

“It’s getting late, Al. I’m thinking a little dinner would be nice. You got time or are you and the others going out to eat?” she asked.

Alphonse grinned. “Well, Miss Felicia, I’ve actually already eaten. I’ve got this amazing recipe I found that I’ve been wanting to try out, and I’d appreciate it if you’d be willing to try it.”

Felicia mewled. “Sounds good,” she said, “How long will it take?”

“Not long, Miss Felicia, I was actually in the process of making it when you called and was planning to offer it to you once I was done. Fifteen minutes, tops.”

Felicia nodded. “Thank you, Alphonse.”

Felicia hung up the phone and sighed, laying down on the couch in her room. She looked around at the lush surroundings, and contemplated just staying in here forever. Everything was so plush, so comfy… The couch she was sitting on was so comfortable, she felt she was sinking into it…

After fifteen minutes, Alphonse came in with the meal, which turned out to be a huge pan of lasagna, big enough to serve ten people. Felicia smelled it before it got there, the scent so delicious that she was salivating heavily.

“Oh my,” she said, looking it over and grinning. “It… It both looks and smells wonderful!”

Alphonse grinned, setting the pan down on the table. “You like? Lemme set it down here and get some plates…”

Before he could leave, however, Felicia began to tear into the lasagna, the smell overcoming any sense of reason, inflaming her hunger to sudden intensity. She used the serving spatula as a kind of spoon to shovel the tremendous amounts of lasagna into her mouth. Cheese and sauce smeared around her face as she stuffed herself, her belly visibly swelling.

Alphonse, for his part, could only watch as Felicia stuffed herself. He secretly took this job because he had a fetish for seeing women eat. To see a woman as beautiful as Felicia stuffing herself… on HIS cooking no less… It was a dream come true. He had to keep still, he didn’t trust himself not to do something inappropriate otherwise.

“Mmmm, delicious!” Felicia moaned, licking her lips and continuing to hungrily stuff herself. Bite after bite, huge scoopfull after huge scoopfull vanished into the catwoman’s ravenous maw, her belly bulging out with each swallow.

Finally, after consuming more than half the pan of lasagna, Felicia stopped. Her belly had bulged out to the size of a basketball, her jaws covered in sauce and gooey cheese. She licked her lips, laying back on the couch and groaning, clutching her heavy belly, which Alphonse could almost hear gurgling as it struggled to digest the load the greedy catwoman had just forced into it.

Felicia groaned, and let out a juicy belch, blushing. “’Scuse me… Sorry, but that lasagna was just so GOOD… I couldn’t help myself, it made me so hungry…”

“So not complaining,” Alphonse heard himself say.
1532.title: Felicia

choices: After Alphonse left, she falls into the food coma while belching and farting
She orders a larger lasagna and some drink as the second helping
15323.content:
Felicia rubbed her belly gently and cooed over the chef. "You're a very correct professional cook, Al! Each time I take a meal you made, I always thought *URP* you're very skilled despite being young. But this lasagna is exceptional!!"

"Th-thanks Miss Felicia." Alphonse smiled shyly, trying not to be noticed that he couldn't take his eyes off from Felicia's sauce-covered bulging belly. "Only a few days ago, I laid in a large stock of some special spice. I heard this product was developed to target the Catwomen and it contains the catnip, the root of kiwifruit and other herbs. All the matters relating to cooking was entrusted to me, so I apologize for not getting your previous permission."

"Oh, I don't mind it, not at all. No wonder I was engrossed in that. Well, then…” Felicia leaned forward slowly and stared the pan of lasagna ravenously, a wet belch escaping her lips. “Resume the dinner!"

Alphonse was taken aback. That spice's effect seems to be a little more powerful than he had expected. His shoulder angel insisted he should stop Felicia and it's for her health. However, the temptation of a celebrity catwoman stuffed herself with his self-confident dish was too much.

"Uh, Miss, are you going to be OK...ea-eating so much? I think you should to keep your image as a singer."

"Of *munch* course!" Felicia answered and took a big bite into lasagna, without looking at Alphonse. All that she saw was the rest of the lasagna, for four persons at the lowest estimate. "But such a small amount won't affect my figure. Probably." She added without thinking deeply.

Truthfully, she was feeling quite full, her belly having a hard fight against very heavy load. However, rather than her stomach's limit, she was more afraid of the possibility that the chef would confiscate this pan if she tells the truth. It’s too delicious to waste!!

Being beside herself with joy, Felicia let go of the serving spatula, and plunged her head into the pan…

----------------------------------------

Several minutes later, the pan was empty.

“ Uuuggghhh…*BUURRP* Excu*BBUUUURRRPP!!* Excuse me…”

Felicia, being smeared all over with greasy sauce and sticky cheese, groaned with stomachache and burped intermittently. Now her belly was swollen to fitness-ball size, slightly flushed pink, and audibly gurgling and sloshing without a pause.

Alphonse remained an awkward silence, his eyes wandering from place to place and regularly being glued to Felicia's overloaded belly in awe. He could not decide whether to continue to use the spice in question or not. It was clear that this is not healthy for Felicia, but he didn't want to miss a chance to have a fetish dream-like time under the pretense that he should serve good meal for his employer.

"Al*BURP*phonse..." Felicia gasped as she tried to allow Alphonse to leave. She was holding her intestinal gas that had been generating rapidly in, but she knew she must let it out (unless she wants to explode). She really didn't want to feel ashamed of herself in front of him.

On the other hand, however, Felicia couldn't get that lasagna's scent and flavor out of her head...

"You think it worked?" one of them asked.

"I honestly think we shouldn't need this stuff," the third maid said, whipping out a duster, "Midna is adorable in her imp form. I don't think she should run around looking for a reverse to this curse. If anything happens, build up an army."

"That's a good point," the first maid retorts, "but you know what's an even better point?"

"What?" The two maids asked in unison.

"If we fatten up Midna to the point of becoming a total blob," the maid plotted, "and if we took her on a journey, it'd be easier to expand the kingdom! Midna can marry someone and then the kingdoms will join forces!"

The maids giggle.

"If Midna can keep herself from looking like a mess!" The maid had a point.

"Oh don't worry, we'll just get someone she already knows to marry her! Like..."

155232221.content: Tetra was in her cabin in the ship. Many years had passed since her and Link explored the Ghost Ship and she was now left with only her original crew on her ship while Link was out doing some heroic things. To make things worse, Tetra was bored out of her mind. She just sat there staring at the door, blankly. Suddenly, Gonzo came in and gave her a bit of good news. "Miss Tetra, we found a new island. There's a huge cave on it that looks like a good place to hide lots of treasure!" Tetra immediately perked up as she heard this. "Oh, finally. Something to do. Well, lets go, come on, move!" Tetra ordered all the crew to the island. When they finally got to land she ordered all the crew to split up and search the island while she searched the cave. Inside the cave she found...
155232221.title: Set Sail

1552322212.content:
Tetra found a huge hole in the cave that seemed to go down at a pretty steep slope and it was deep enough that she could not see the bottom. "Gonzo! Get a rope and lower me down." He ran to the ship and got the longest rope he could find. As he lower Tetra, a sweet smell surrounded her. She felt herself become instantly hungry and it got worse lower she went. When she got to the bottom she saw a huge pile of freshly preserved meats, fruits, and even sweets. She tried to run for it but she had gotten as far as the rope would allow. "Gonzo, let go!" Tetra demanded. "But Miss Tetra, if I do that, you'll be stuck down there!" "I don't care. There's... uh... some really great loot down here. I'm sure there's another way out. These caves seem to go out in different directions. One of them has to be a second exit. Now just let go!" Gonzo followed his orders and let go. As soon as Tetra no longer felt the pull against her she darted straight for the food. "Miss Tetra should we try and meet up with you by finding the other cave?" Gonzo said, still feeling unsure about this. "NO!!! Um I mean, no. I'll be fine. Just continue searching the rest of the island then wait for me on the ship." Again, Gonzo did as he was told. He and the rest of the crew continued to search the island while Tetra had her feast.

Tetra ate just about anything and everything she could reach. The food in this cave was better than even the best Windfalls most gourmet chefs had to offer. She couldn't stop herself as she shoveled every tasty treat into her happily awaiting stomach. All the while she is kept so entranced by the food that she does not notice...

15523222122.content:
Tetra was shoveling food in her mouth quickly at first, but as her feast went on, she moved slower, just bringing more food to her mouth at one time. Eventually, she decided to just lay into the piles of food and let it fall in on its own. This lasted for a while until she had to move over to make more food fall. She soon realized this wasn't working that well. "Man, I really don't feel like moving but I'm still really hungry. I wish someone was here to feed me."

Suddenly, she heard a voice echo through the caves. "Allow me to help you." it said and a Great Fairy appeared in front of her. "Wow a Great Fairy, but what are you ding here? This doesn't look like a Great Fairy island." Tetra questioned. "I'm a secret Great Fairy who appears only to the most diligent adventures. You must have done much exploring to find me. As such I will reward you with whatever you desire." Tetra smiled at this. Now she had someone to feed her and do whatever else she wanted.

However, this conversation had snapped her out of her trance and she began to notice the effects of the food "Well I am still very hungry and I'm feeling kind of lazy, which is weird for me, and I did eat quite a lot already, now that I think about it." Tetra looked down to see her stomach slightly bulging out, nothing drastic but more than she would like. "Oh no, I didn't mean to get fat! Maybe I should leave but I don't really want to. Great Fairy, what do you think?" This was an odd question for the fairy to answer because she never really concerned herself with physical appearances though she was getting a strange feeling from this young girl. She had a feeling of wanting to see what happened if she ate more. She wanted to feed her and watch her eat.

"Well young one, I could feed you for now and if you don't like what happens, I can always change you back with my magic." the Great Fairy said, hiding her true intentions. Tetra would have jumped for joy if she felt like getting up to do that. So instead she just replied "That would be great, feed me anything you like I'm starving!" And that's exactly what the Great Fairy did. She began to

Four years had passed since Souji had left Inaba. Chie and Yukiko had become more than friends and were in a steady relationship, the couple living together in a little apartment near the inn.

On this particular day, Chie was woken up by Yukiko like she usually was: the dark haired young woman giving her a deep kiss on the lips.

During Yukiko's stretch, Chie noticed the muffin top cropping around Yukiko's pajama bottoms. A heat burned in her belly at the sight. For a moment she found herself wanting Yukiko to get softer.

"I call shower first!" Chie cried after several minutes of snuggling, racing out of the bed towards the shower, giving Yukiko a view of her flabbier butt. Yukiko blushed at the sight and also at the notion that she wanted Chie to have a fatter ass, one Yukiko could fondle whenever she wanted.

Gulping, she called after Chie.

"I'll join you in the shower!"

Ah, the Johto region... One of the many regions in this vast world inhabited by Pokémon and Pokémon trainers alike, known to be leaning closer over to the traditional ways of the Japanese culture and located west of Kanto; and located south of Sinnoh.
