1553322222212111.content:
"Sorry I'm late! Mother thought letting me sleep in would be a good idea and turned off my alarm." the doors to Professor Elm's lab burst open, and the proud Krys adjusted her hat and pushed her bright blue hair into place before she walked towards the opposite side of the small building. Her confident strut caught the attention of both the Pokemon Professor and his assistant.

"Oh it's no problem Krys, I don't really have much planned today anyways" Elm placed a book on his desk, heading to a table with three balls on it "Knowing you, you probably memorized everything I would normally say at this point, so how about we just skip to the main event?"

"Naturaly! Can't keep the world waiting much longer, right?" with a cocky rub of her nose, Krys walked up to the same table, then examined each ball. "so which one is it?"


"The one in the middle, but I have to warn you..."
1553322222212111.title: "Everyone will know my name"

choices: Kris wants to start training her Pokemon immediately
Cyndaquil refuses to listen to Kris
15533222222121111.content:
"That Cyndaquil doesn't do much..."

"What do you mean Professor?" asked Kris. "Well... see for yourself," he answered.

Wondering what he meant, Kris grabbed the ball and flung it up into the air releasing the Pokémon onto the lab floor. There in-front of her was the Pokémon the professor was talking about, a small mouse-like creature that had four red spots on its back.

"Aww... it's so cute," she said.

The Cyndaquil looked up towards Kris before letting out a loud yawn, lowering itself down to the floor. Within a few seconds, it was already snoring and letting out a small bubble from its nose.

"...You're kidding right?"

"Oh no, I wasn't joking at all, if you like you can pick a different Pokémon," Elm acknowledged with a nervous chuckle.

Kris had always been a fan of fire type Pokémon and she wasn't going let this Cyndaquil ruin her chances of becoming a Pokémon master, regaining her self-confidence, she grinned and said, "Don't worry Professor, once this Cyndaquil is under my care, it'll be a force to be reckoned with!"

Shocked by her statement, but quickly smiling from her beaming confidence Elm proceeded to walk over to his desk. "Very well, before you start your journey, Kris can you do me a small favour?"

"Anything for you Professor, what is it?"

"A friend of mine called Mr. Pokémon has a gift for me, and I was wondering if you could retrieve it for me." Elm adjusted his glasses and sat down by his desk.

Nodding her head with assurance, Kris picked up her Pokémon and exited the building to start her journey... just not the journey she's expecting.
15533222222121111.title: "That Cyndaquil doesn't do much"

choices: Kris soon wakes up re-energized, ready to visit Mr. Pokemon!
She wakes up still tired and hungry, time to vist the Pokemart!
155332222221211112.content:
It couldn't of been more then several steps into the tall grass just West of Newbark Town, and already a creature was assaulting Kris.

"Alright Cyndaquil, this is it! I know this is our first battle as a team but we can do this together!" Kris was filled with excitement, she was ready to show off to... well, technically no one was there so just the the world, what she was made of. "Okay Cyndaquil, use tackle!" She pointed towards the wild Rattata for dramatic effect and emphasis.

A wave of energy and confidence flowed towards Cyndaqui, ready to inspire, ready to motivate, to assure that they could face any challenge placed in front of them, that they could go all the way if they just tried.

Cyndaquil turned it's head to it's new foe, and swiftly...





... fell asleep.

"... Uhoh..."

------------------

Kris barely managed to survive route 29, but she had finally reached Cherrygrove City. After a quick, forced, tour from some old man, she stopped at the pokecenter, to rest and catch her breath. She couldn't help but yawn, the whole incident tired her out.

"I guess I'll have to pick up the gift for tomorrow..."

Kris sat in the couner of the center. She placed the lazy moused onto her lap as she started to doze off, soon having a bubble in her nose to match her Cyndaquil's
155332222221211112.title: Ignoring Life Threatening Situations

choices: Cyndaquil makes a mess of itself (Same thing happens to Kris)
Cyndaguill gets gassy from the food (Same thing happens to Kris)
1553322222212111122.content:
It was a brand new day in Johto, the Pidgey nearby were singing and chirping in the morning sun and the people of Cherrygrove City were waking up to start their day. After a rather rough start with her newly obtained Pokémon, Kris was ready to take charge and truly begin her journey!

If only she wasn’t mumbling in her sleep still…

“Yeah… go get them Cyndaquil,” she spoke in between snores. Meanwhile her Cyndaquil remained on her lap throughout the night; still fast asleep too. Eventually Kris was woken up Nurse Joy of the center; who couldn’t stand the combined snoring from the two. As the nurse nudged them, Kris’ and her Cyndaquil’s bubbles popped from shock.

“Oh… OH! Sorry Nurse Joy,” rubbing with her back with a nervous chuckle. “Well this is rather embarrassing,” she thought to herself. Collecting her things and still carrying her Pokémon, Kris left the center and began her way to the next route; every second letting out a loud long yawn from her mouth. Unfortunately there was another bump on the road for her.

Only a couple of steps out from the Pokémon Center and Kris’ stomach was letting out constant growls, wanting to be fed and fast. Rubbing her flat stomach, she also noticed Cyndaquil was growling for food too. “I guess we’re both hungry huh?” she giggled. “Maybe this can help us bond,” she thought. Luckily the Poke-Mart was just next door to the Pokémon Center.

Once inside Kris purchased all sorts of food and snacks for her adventure, from sandwiches, chocolate bars, and fizzy drinks and so on; until she kindly paid the person at the counter. Taking a seat near the entrance of route 30, she gently placed Cyndaquil on the floor and gave it it’s share. Patting it on the head, Kris smiled and said, “Let’s dig in!”
1553322222212111122.title: She wakes up still tired and hungry

choices: Kris changes clothes. She IS the future champiom after all!
No time to waste! Kris heads off to receive Elm's gift
15533222222121111221.content:
Kris' Cyndaquil sniffed the food infront of it, just to check, before it began eating lazily. it attempted to take large bites, often times smearing stuff on its face as a result. Things like mayonnaise, and bits of mushed chocolate, soon covered it's mouth, chin, and lower neck...

Kris herself wasn't acting any better, as her attempts to shove as much of each sandwich into her mouth as possible. Crumbs and condiments surrounded her mouth, covering her cheeks and chin.

After finishing each of her sandwiches, she looked to her candy and chocolate. "I guess dessert wouldn't hurt... I do love sweets after all." taking a bite of some chocolate, she was reminded how good such treats tasted. Looking left and right to see if anyone was watching, and started cramming more candy into her mouth than it could actually hold, causing bits of wet, sticky crumbs, and melted chocolate drops fell onto her clothes.

Refusing to be beaten by such a simple human limitation, she held it all in with her hands, and forced her mouth to chew until she could swallow bits of the massive clump of sugar down her throath. upon one last swallow, she let out a victorious sigh.

Finally full, she rubbed her messy hand over her now slightly bulged stomach, leaving behind a messy hand print on her shirt. "That hit the spot... how are you doing Cyndaquil?"

Her tiny partner had eaten all it could handle, and laid on it's side on top of it's own mess as ot yawned. "Wow, you're pretty messy after all of that, huh?" Cyndaquil let out a small sound of bliss as it started to doze off. "Tired already? But it's still so early..." Kris' train of thought was interupted by the sound of snoring. "... Why does something so lazy have to be so cute?"

As the young trainer picked up the mouse like pokemon, she only now noticed she herself was coverd in food. "Oh, wow, what happened to me? I've never gotten this carried away before!" as she cradled the young pokemon, she remembered her mother had made her pack a spare set of clothes. She'd have to waste time heading back to the center to change though, and already she had wasted quite a bit of time, and she was still supposed to retrieve Professor Elm's present from Mr. Pokemon, It wasn't like she was expecting to make a good first impression for anyone important, right?
15533222222121111221.title: Making a Mess of Yourself

155332222221211112212.content:
No time to waste! Kris wasn’t attending some sort of fancy party, she’s a Pokémon trainer and getting messy was part of the experience…!

So she thought. “I’ll clean all of this later, Professor Elm is relying on me!”

Leaving a trail of crumbs and rubbish from the spot they were, Kris and her equally messy companion Cyndaquil headed off towards Mr. Pokémon’s home in route 30. Compared to yesterday, Kris was full of energy and ready to take on any challenge that awaited her, today? Not so much. Slightly winded and puffing for air, Kris stumbled along route 30 towards Mr. Pokémon’s house.

“Maybe… *Huff* I shouldn’t have… *Huff* eating that much,” panting with each step she took. Cyndaquil slept peacefully in Kris’ arms as she proceeded through the harsh grass fields. While Cyndaquil was snoring and letting it’s bubble expand and deflate, it soon brought up a new pattern in it’s lazy behaviour. “Why is my arm suddenly damp?” wondered Kris. Stopping to investigate, she soon found out where the source of dampness was coming from, Cyndaquil was drooling all over her arms; making her sleeves wet from it’s salvia.

“AAAAHH! Oh come on Cyndaquil!” But before she could lecture her Pokémon’s indecent actions, Kris saw a wild Caterpie that had appeared in-front of them. “Alright Cyndaquil, its show time!” Gently putting Cyndaquil down to face this bug Pokémon, Kris pointed and shouted, “Cyndaquil use Tackle!”

But Cyndaquil just remained still and snored. “Not again…” Kris whined. As the Caterpie slowly approached Cyndaquil ready to attack, it was suddenly engulfed by flames. “What the-?!” While Cyndaquil didn’t move or follow her trainer’s command, instead Cyndaquil let out a sneeze which let out a tiny fireball. Surprised to see this one hit the foe, Kris quickly pulled out a Poke ball.

“Poke ball go!” Kris chucked the sphere at the fallen bug and within seconds she had obtained her second Pokémon. Well it wasn’t what she was expecting, but it was certainly a step up from yesterday’s battle. “Good job Cyndaquil,” complimenting her partner. “Quil…?” mumbled Cyndaquil.

Re-energised from the battle Kris and Cyndaquil headed up to a little house halfway up of the route. There she received an apricot basket and even more snacks to carry in her backpack, as she made her way to Mr. Pokémon’s house. Winded again but not defeated Kris stood in front of Mr. Pokémon’s house and entered.
155332222221211112212.title: No time to waste! Kris heads off to receive Elm...

choices: Kris wakes early and well rested, and bumps into a red haired boy
Kris wakes uncomfortable again and is late. She bumps into... Lyra?
1553322222212111122121.content:
Kris examined the inside. "Not much of a home..." the most defining feature of the main room was a pair of computers and wires taking up a good chunk of the room. She then noticed a man in a white lab coat, facing the other way.

"Hello? I was sent to retreive a package for Elm. Mr. Pokemon I presume?" she closed the gap between the two of them as the man turned around, only to meet with a sudden revelation.

"P-professer Oak!?" Kris took a few steps back as she held up her equally messy Cyndaquil in front of her face as she turned red with embarrassment, it yawned, just now waking up from another sleep.

This was possibly the most embarrasing thing to ever happen to her in her life. Here was the leading authority on all things Pokemon to see her looking like a complete SLOB as their first impression. It's only beena day and a half, and yet this adventure just kept getting worse and worse...

The Professor placed a hand on Kris' shoulder "Ah, you're fine. You're only young once, so it's okay to occasionally get carried away when trying to bond wih your Pokemon." He lifted his hand, and Kris lowered her Cyndaquil, revealing her still red face. "Although... you both should probably go easy on the sweets."

Only now did Kris notice another man in the room. Turning to see the old, mustachio'd man in a brown suit, with a matching hat, she feelt he looked like he was dressed to go to a fancy restaurant in the cold seasons. He was checking the computer moniter, when he noticed the visitors. "Ah, you must be here for the package. Hang on while I get it for you..."

A momentary silence passed, before Oak quickly turned his attention to Kris and offered a pokedex. Kris nodded, quickly realizing how great an honor such an offer was. "If you find the time, try and fill it out as much as you can. I can use all the help I can get"

As Professer Oak left, Mr. Pokemon came back with the package. "Be very careful with this, it's quite fragile."

-----------------

Kris had and easier time getting back to Cherrygrove now that she had a CaterpIe, this gave her time to think as she walked. Specifically about the package "I wonder what it is?" Her thoughts were cut short ae her pokegear rang, and incoming call came from Professor Elm. She quickly answered "Yes?"

"H-hello? Kris? It's a disaster! Uh, um, it's just terrible! What should I do? It... Oh, no... Please get back here now!"

"I'm on my way Professer! I should be there by morning!" Kris was actually closer than she let on, she very well could of gotten there before midnight, but something in her just couldn't find the energy to walk much longer. She'd have to stop by the center in Cherrygrove again and rest before she could make it to the lab.

-----------------

In the courner of the Pokemon center, Kris and Cyndaquil were once again sleeping, complete with matching bubbles as they snored. This time around however, Kris appeared to be drooling...
1553322222212111122121.title: Receiving the package

15533222222121111221212.content: We could either make Lyra replace Silver in this story making her Kris' rival or just a random encounter?
15533222222121111221212.title: What kind of Lyra do you want?

choices: Kris gets distracted by the wonders of berry picking
155332222221211112212121.content:
Refreshed and ready for action, Kris packed her things and left as fast as she could from the Pokémon center, not even bothering to clean herself up again and leaving a puddle of her drooling mess; to find what was wrong at Professor Elm’s lab.

Just as they were about to enter route 29, Kris and Cyndaquil had an unexpected encounter. Suddenly out of nowhere, some girl appeared in Kris’ line of sight and approached them. Wearing a white rounded hat with a red ribbon on it that was followed by her blue overalls and yellow handbag, Kris could only assume she too was a Pokémon trainer heading out to start her journey.

“Aahh, so you’re the one who took the other Pokémon at the lab?” she said. Kris remained silent at this stranger, wondering what her ploy was. Leaning in closer to have a better glance at Kris and her sleeping Cyndaquil, the girl’s face quickly changed to a wicked grin. “What a waste, oh well, at-least you and your Pokémon have one thing in common,” she chuckled.

“You’re both pigs.”

Angered by her statement, Kris immediately put Cyndaquil down and instantly glared back at this stranger. “OH REALLY?! Well then, show me what you got ‘Miss Perfectionist’”! Barking back with rage, her words shooting some spit out and landing on the girl’s clothes. Wiping it away with disgust, Lyra continued to snicker. “I’ll show you what I mean!”

From there a battle commenced between the two girls, Kris calling her Cyndaquil ready to fight, while their mysterious friend threw out a Poke-Ball; which came with a surprise. Out came a… Totodile!

“Oh no…” she muttered. But there was something rather different about this particular Totodile, it was rather plump and was constantly salivating. Not wanting to back down, Kris cleared her throat and said, “Cyndaquil use tackle!” Expecting her Pokémon to do nothing again, this time however it managed to stand up and lazily bump into Totodile. “Good work!” cheering it. Irritated by that first shot, the stranger commanded Totodile to use bite, but instead of chomping on Cyndaquil instead it started wolfing down some random berries. “You idiot!” Kris and Cyndaquil laughed at this remarkable display.

The fight was long and tedious but in the end, Kris won from the combined efforts Cyndaquil and Caterpie, while her opponent’s Totodile was more interesting chowing down on food it somehow acquired. On the verge of tears, the stranger quickly grabbed her defeated Pokémon and sprinted off before shouting out, “The name’s Lyra! And next time we meet, I’m gonna be a Pokémon Master!”

“Hah, yeah righ-*URP*!” Kris snapped back before interrupted by a sudden belch. “That came out of nowhere,” she thought. Patting her Pokémons’ heads for their hard work, they continued on their way back to Elm’s lab.
155332222221211112212121.title: Now that's just rude...

choices: Spend one last day at home with mom
Spend one last NIGHT at home with mom
1553322222212111122121211.content:
Kris ran as fast as she could, she could see Newbark not far off. "Were're almost there Cyndaquil, just a little fur..." Kris came to a stop and turned around. It was there she came to the realization that she had left BOTH her Pokemon to chase after her, a lazy mouse, and caterpillar, on foot...

------------

"I'M SO SORRY!" Kris yelled as she ran through the same route for the third time in a row. She carried both her tired pokemon in her arms as she was once again at the final stretch to Newbark.

When the trainer finally arrived, saying she was winded would be an understatement. She trudged towards the lab as she wiped the sweat that was dripping off her forehead, one of multiple places it had gathered, along with the color of the shirt, now soaked with the salty liquids coming out of her skin.

She placed down her two pokemon just as she came to the front door of Elm's lab, and opened it, heavily breathing as both she and her two partners walked entered. "I'm... *pant* I'm here... *cough* Sorry I..." her vision started tto turn blurry as she continued foward, both her pokemon collapsing due to exhaustion. "Took... so..."

Kris whited out

------------

"Kris...? Kris? I think she's coming to!" Kris' eyes opened, being greeted by the sight of Elm's assistant as she slowly became aware of her surroundings. "Here's some water." She reached for the opened bottle and quickly downed the whole thing. Shortly after she noticed she was on the floor, a blanket had been put on top of her. "Sorry about that... Some rude girl with a Totodile got in the way... amung other issues"

Elm's assistant nodded, looking towards a now sleeping Cyndaquil. "I can tell you were in quite a rush... You know, I never would of belived that Cyndaquil would ever move on it's own had I not seen it for myself."

A man in blue walked up to her, and kneeled down, holding up a notepad. "You mentioned battling a girl with a Totodile? She apparently stole it from Elm, you wouldn't of happened to know her name, would you?"

Kris nodded, thinking back to when the girl ran off. "She said he name was Lyra." With a quick few strokes of his pencil, the officer took note of the name and stood up before walking out of the lab. "Thank you for your cooperation"

Elm appeared to be far too stressed to talk about the situation properly... or speak properly period. So Kris handed the package to the assistant. "I'll stop by later to talk to the Professor, but for now I think I'll spend a little time at home."

"It's probably for the better (for both of you, you need a bath...), I'll make sure he gets this..."
1553322222212111122121211.title: Back to the Lab

choices: Kris manages to eat all the food (Weight Gain and Gassiness)
Kris only manages to eat half of her meal (Messiness Overload)
15533222222121111221212112.content:
It had been rather stressful today, with all the running and teasing from that Lyra girl, Kris decided it was best to rest at home for the night; hopefully tomorrow will be much better than today. Still carrying her Cyndaquil in her damp arms with her Caterpie trailing behind, they arrived at Kris’ residence where they were greeted by Kris’ mother who was sitting down in the lounge watching whatever was on T.V.

“Hi Mom, I’m home,” Kris announced dropping her things near the door.

“Kris? You’re back so soon, what’s happened?” There sitting on the sofa was Kris’ mother, even though she was in her mid-thirties; her mother was still a beautiful woman. She was lean yet voluptuous; sporting a clean apron that hid her white skirt and orange tank top. “Did something bad happen dear or-?” Getting up to face her daughter, she noticed how unclean her little girl was from the last time they saw each other. “Kris… what am I going to do with you?” Giggling at the sight of Kris’ clothes; making Kris slightly blush. “First dear, you and your little friends need a wash, then we’ll talk.”

------------

After a nice hot shower, handing her dirty laundry to her mother and the constant struggles to clean Cyndaquil, Kris wearing her PJs sat at the table with her mother preparing dinner for them.

“And that’s what happened Mom,” Kris spoke after explaining all the crazy events that had happened. “Sounds like to me your adventure has been rather ‘outrageous’,” Kris’ mother joked. “Moomm!” trying not to laugh at her mother’s bad attempt to sound hip.

As the two continued to talk, Kris’ mother finished preparing dinner, serving out a rather chunky looking beef covered in a lot of gravy sauce, mashed potatoes and mixed vegetables. Kris was astonished by all this amount of food and said, “Whoa Mom, are you sure we can all of this?” Laughing at her daughter’s statement, she simply answered, “Well, I’m only thinking about your two special friends, after all they are part of the family now.”

Looking down to the floor, Kris saw her Pokémon looking towards the food and licking their chops with glee; especially her Cyndaquil with the waterfall display. Kris smiled and proceeded to hand out their portion of the meal and started collecting her own share. “Thanks Mom, you’re the best.”
15533222222121111221212112.title: Spend one last NIGHT at home with Mom

155332222221211112212121121.content:
Kris had already gathered a second helping, suffing as much of it in her mouth as she could fit on her fork each go. She couldn't quite tell what, but something about her Mother's cooking always tasted like perfection. Though usually she doesn't cook quite this much.

"Mmm, so good. just like always!" before taking another mouthful, Kris noticed something pressing against her leg. wiping some drool off her mouth with her arm, she turned to the source of the pushing. "Oh, you guys want some more too? Here you go!"

Placing down more to eat for her pokemon, Kris returned to her own plate to take another bite of some creamy mashed potatos, only to feel as if her stomach was being pushed in. She placed a hand on her slightly bulged gut, and thought about putting down her fork.

"Then again..." Kris' mind told her it was a good idea to stop, and not to overdo it. but a growling in her stomach knew it could be a very long time before she'd have a chance to taste her mother's wonderful cooking. "I guess I can overeat just this once..." and so she resumed eating, taking care not to drop even the smallest crumb. A meal like this was too good to waste, and she hadn't eaten all day.

While Caterpie was already full, having fallen asleep, Kris' Cyndaquil had wanted one last go. Unfortunately, the rest of the food had already vanished, leaving a bloated gut large enough to show just a crack of Kris' belly. "S-sorry Cyndaquil... I guess I over did it, huh... *urp*"

Kris' Mother giggled, covering her mouth to hide a smile. "You really were hungry, huh?" she then placed a freshly baked pie on the table "I guess you don't have room for dessert, huh?" her smile grew bigger as she asked the rhetorical question

"You know I alwa*urp*... always have room for your apple pie, mom! (exscuse me) One for Cyndaquil too, please!" Her partner took great pleasure in seeing a slice placed in front of it, wasting no time chowing down as the young trainer did the same.

--------------

"Ohhh... I can't *urp* believe we ate it *uuurrrp* all... *BUUURP*" Kris gave up on excusing herself for each belch as she placed her two sleeping pokemon on the foot of her bed. "*urp*"

She looked down at her swollen stomach, she could see quite a bit of skin showing between her pajamas. It hurt a little, but it felt a bit better as she tstarted to rub it. "But... it was just so good. It was totally worth-*FRRRT*..." Kris' face turned a heavy shade of red as she realized she was just cut off by a rather loud fart she had made herself. "I really hope Mom didn't hear that."
155332222221211112212121121.title: Eating it All

choices: Along the way there, Kris' attitude and manners slightly change...
Along the way there, Kris is hungry again
1553322222212111122121211211.content:
Dawn of a new day, as the morning sun shined brightly over New Bark Town, it was another day for adventure and excitement for Kris and her team who were getting themselves ready to head off.

"Zzzz... Quil..." As usual Kris was struggling to get her companion awake and alert. "Come on Cyndaquil." Before letting out a long yawn herself. "Geez, watching you sleep is also making me… tried as well, you know?" Scratching her rump without a single thought. Eventually Cyndaquil managed to wake up when it's nose picked up a nice sweet scent from downstairs; even Kris could smell it.

"Mmm... Pancakes," licking her lips.

------------------------

After a nice breakfast and another goodbye to her mother, Kris and Cyndaquil went to Professor Elm's lab to continue what was left off from yesterday’s conversation. Entering the lab while still licking her sticky hands from the amount of maple syrup she poured onto her pancakes, she saw the professor by his desk before he noticed her presence.

"Ah there you are Kris," he beamed before noticing the sticky stains on Kris' clothes and her Pokémon’s face. "I see you had one heck of a breakfast." Blushing at what he meant, Kris tried to clean herself up by wiping her hands on her clothes. "So Professor, what's in *Urp* the package?" Quickly changing the subject and blushing redder than before.

"Ah yes, the package," Turning around and pulling the package up onto the desk, there he revealed what was inside. "Behold Kris." Opening the top of the box, there inside was an oddly coloured egg. "An egg...?" she asked in confusion.

"Not just any kind of egg my dear, a Pokémon Egg to be more precise," He boasted while re-adjusting his glasses. "This is one of Mr. Pokémon’s biggest discoveries and this can certainly help with my continued research about Pokémon Evolution."

------------------------

Later on Kris also told the Professor she happened to meet Professor Oak there at Mr. Pokémon’s residence and she was given a Poke-Dex. Showing him the device made Elm jump back from his desk in surprise before smiling again.

"Th-That's incredible! He must have seen some sort of potential in you Kris," he stammered. "I think you might have what it takes to be even the Champion, you should head to Violet City and challenge the Gym there!" Stroking Cyndaquil’s head, Kris smiled how much they had achieved in a few days.

From there Kris made her way to Violet City.
1553322222212111122121211211.title: The next day...

choices: Visit Sprout Tower the next day first
Head straight to the Violet City Gym the next day
15533222222121111221212112111.content:
Save for a couple wold pokemon battles, route 29 was rather uneventful this time around, Thankfully, this meant she was making good time, so Kris decided to pick a few things up at the pokemart in Cherrygrove before heading to route 30. Halfway through though, she had her second ever trainer battle against a youngster named Joey...

"Wow... that was *burp* actually kinda sad..." Kris murmured under her breath

Shortly after his defeat, Joey asked for Kris' number. "I'll ring you for some battles. I'm a rookie too, so I think it'd be a good motivator." As Kris was about to reject his offer, she noticed a flash of light. Turning her head to the source, she found that her Caterpie was now a Metapod. Easy money and fighting experience now seemed a bit hard to pass up. "Sure!"

-------------

Kris had gotten so carried away battling other trainers that she had lost track of time, and now it was pretty dark. For the firat time, she finally decided to feel her now somewhat squishy stomach. "Hmm..." she wasn't really too hungry, but she was felt too tired to move on, so Kris decided to rest near the start of Route 31 until she caught her breath. And what better excuse to eat something good than resting by a warm fire...

that she had to start herself, as her Cyndaquil decided to sleep. Apparently, Kris could only motivate it during battle, as it was rarely in motion at any other time, unless food was involved.

"Well then, I guess that means more for me!" She teased. Kris knew Cyndaquil would be awoken by the scent of something edible. Kris pulled a can of beans from her bag, bought at the Cherrygrove Pokemart. "I knew this would come in handy!" Peeling the lid off of the easy open can, she licked her lips, ready to dig in once she pulled out a spoon.

Taking out a big scoop, Kris shoved the spoon into her mouth, dropping quite a bit onto her lap. she then proceeded to talk with her mouth full. "Mmm, Shoooo goood... Here you gho SHinduhquil!" As even more fell out of her mouth, she gave a few scoops to Cyndaquil, spoonfeeding it as if it was a child, then wiped the spoon on her shirt to clean it before eating some more herself.

-------------

"Mmm, so glad I bought that *URRRP* second can!" Kris said before getting on her knees and leaning over to search her bag. "Now to *buuurp* wash it down with some soda!" As the messy trainer looked through her stuff to find something to drink, the moon had fully peaked over the horizon, signifying that night had arrived, and some wild pokemon went to sleep...

However, while her attention was elsewhere, she failed to notice one rare pokemon that roamed the night, a ghostly creature made of toxic gasses, difficult to see in the darkness. Unoticed by either of her pokemon, the creature was about to engulf it's prey and suffocate her with it's poisonous body when...

"Ah! here they a- *phrt*" as Kris sat up with a bottle of soda in each hand, the dim light of the campfire showed her face as it turned red. Despite the fact no one was around to hear it, Kris couldn't help but feel deeply embarrassed by the sound of gas escaping from her backside. Her face faded back to it's normal color though as she heard the sound of something coughing. Turning to see the source of the sound, she let out a scream, waking up Cyndaquil and Metapod.

She was about ready to run, when she noticed it was keeping a distance. The distance only grew upon the sound of another fart escaping from Kris' rear. "... Heh... heheh..." A smile could be found sneaking on Kris' face, the Irony of the situation was not lost on her. Burst out in laughter, her gas flatulence going crazy, being unable to control herself as the wild Ghastly was ready to flee, turning around. But it's escape was cut short by a sticky string covering it's face. As it struggled to get it off, it soon met up with a small shot of fire, burning it.

"Heehee! Good job guys! Now leave the rest to me!" Kris managed to suppress her Laughter as she pulled out a pokeball. "You're mine Ghastly!" The ball collided with the partially solid gas cloud, engulfing it in a flash of light as it was sucked in. The struggle was short lived before the ball clicked shut, sealing the ghost inside. "Alright! We *urp* did it!"

-------------

Kris headed toward Violet City, off to win her first badge once she got some rest at the nearest pokemon center. She didn't feel so embarrassed of her gas problem anymore, in fact she was actually kind of proud of it. But not as proud as she was of her two pokemon. She was ready to be a master, and tomorrow was the day she'd take her first real step towards that goal.
15533222222121111221212112111.title: A slight change in attitude

choices: Take a short (long) break before heading to the Gym
Head there straight away feeling confident
155332222221211112212121121111.content:
First day in Violet City and already Kris was making a mess of things around the place. After her and Pokémon had eating an enormous breakfast at the Pokémon Center, Kris marched out and was set to find the gym in the city and earn her first gym badge. Not bothering to change her dirty and slightly tight clothes once more, she stumbled her way through the city, constantly letting out little belches out now and again; until she noticed something that caught her interests.

Approaching what she saw, there she discovered a huge three-tiered tower made entirely out of wood with multiple eaves. “Hmm… Maybe some sightseeing couldn’t hurt,” Pondering at the idea while her hand scratched her slightly exposed belly poking out underneath her top. “What do you think Cyndaquil?” Lifting her companion to face her directly, the little Pokémon merely sneezed and resumed sleeping; leaving quite a mess on Kris’ pudgy face. “…I’ll take that as a yes.”

Once inside Kris was astonished by what she had discovered…

-------------

“Coming *HUFF* here *PANT* was a *HUFF* mistake…” Puffing and mumbling with regret, Kris found herself climbing a series of stairs to get to each floor of the tower, to her surprise and common knowledge of everyone else; there wasn’t any elevators to use; just a huge amount of stairs to climb. Not wanted to really strain herself, she put Cyndaquil back in it’s Poke-ball unless there’s a battle about to commence in the tower.

Speaking of which, it wasn’t just stairs she had to endure, when she had reached the second floor she had battled a couple of the sages that resided there, each with a Bellsprout under their care and very thing that tower’s theme is based upon. The battles didn’t last very long as Metapod and her newly obtained Ghastly made short work of them; meanwhile Cyndaquil slept through the whole thing. Eventually she had reached the third and final floor of the building, her whole body was sweating not-stop from the ‘little’ exercise she went through to get here. Sweat had completely soaked her clothes, as she raised her chubby arms slightly to let the cool air flow under her armpits.

“Finally…” Still gasping for air before letting out air of her own from her sweaty arse.

PPPPPPPPPPPPPFFFFFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTT!!!

Moaning with a tiny hint of pleasure, Kris dumbly smiled at the relief she had let out into the room before noticing who she saw in front of her. There up ahead was that girl she had encountered a few days ago, Lyra!

“As promised here’s your HM,” said the sage. “But let me say this, you should look after yourself and your Pokémon with your… well…” Before he could finish, Lyra quickly turned around to leave but saw Kris standing in her way; she looked rather… different.

When Kris met Lyra, she had a skinny frame of a body; but now? She almost matches the same amount of meat found on Kris, with the exception of the massive potbelly that was being well held within her overalls; along with her chubby thighs and plump hips. Sucking on what seemed to be a lollipop, Lyra glared at Kris and said, “Hmmph, you again!”

“If you’re here to try your luck with the Elder, spoiler alert, he’s weak and doesn’t offer much a challenge.” Before getting any chance the question her, Lyra bumped Kris aside with her belly and left the floor in a hurry.

-------------

Exiting the building, Kris received a HM with a moved called Flash after defeating the Elder and hearing his words of wisdom. Unfortunately he wasn’t the gym leader and the gym was actually on the far left side near the tower. Feeling she made some progress anyway and got some extra hours of prep time before the eventful match with the gym leader, she decided to…
155332222221211112212121121111.title: Visiting Sprout Tower of Sprouts

choices: Eat a big breakfast the next day, and continue the jouney normally to Azalea
Eat a big breakfast the next day, but the shortcut to Goldenrod is unblocked
1553322222212111122121211211112.content:
Kris' cocky attitude refused to let her back down from a challenge, and her body was refilled with newfound energy as she marched on towards the gym...

... until she reached the front door. "Maybe... *pant* Maybe I should of rested first..." Despite how winded she was, she stubbornly walked through the entrance, refusing to rest until she came out with a badge.

-----------------

All this excitment left her soaked in sweat, near breathless, and unable to stand up. Although the two trainers who had impeded her Progress were not much of a challenge, all the hype building up was really wearing her down. But now she was face to face with the leader of the gym, Falkner, Who looked a bit unsure about the situation. "Uh.., you know... we can hold off on the battle until you catch you're breath if you want..."

"Fight... *pant* pokemon... *pant* now..." PFFFFFFRT "WHEW! That's a huge relief right there!"

As Kris stood up, she felt like a weight was lifted off her shoulder. Falkner however, looked a bit disturbed. "... Fine, very well, it's time you witnessed the power of bird pokemon!"

-----------------

Kris walked out of the gym, Zephyr badge in the palm of her hand, and a wad of cash in the other. Despite a slight disadvantage, Kris pulled through with only a little trouble. "I did it! I got my *BURP* first badge! I... I need to lay down..." A puddle of sweat started to form as she stood there, finally taking a moment to breath properly.

She needed to make one last stop today, and that was to the pokemon center. She and her pokemon needed a rest, and maybe some food...

A lot of food...

She had plenty of money.

She could continue her journey tomorrow, Tonight she'd rest, relax, and dine. Not necessarily in that order though, as she could hear her stomach growling for food.

"Maybe I'll take the shortcut to Goldenrod City before heading down to Azalea Town. I hear it's a great place with great food!!"
1553322222212111122121211211112.title: Breaking wind

choices: A stranger man tries selling Kris a... Slowpoke tail?
15533222222121111221212112111121.content:
Not even bothering to be polite anymore, the next day, Kris and her Pokémon got straight down to eating breakfast. Stuffing four fried eggs in her mouth at once, causing the grease and some yolk to drip from her mouth down to her body, before grabbing some sausages and shoving them down her throat as well; already finishing her 5th one. While Kris was going full on gluttony this morning, Cyndaquil chomped loudly on it’s share of food, getting equally messier as it’s owner; shoving some Onion Rings down it’s stuffed mouth. Even Metapod and Ghastly were mimicking the two, as they too were also lost on the delicious tastes.

UUURRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPP! Letting out a thunderous burp out in the building for everyone to hear. “Mmm… delicious…” Kris beamed lipping her fingers with delight.

Paying Nurse Joy for the big breakfast and collecting her things, Kris waddled her way out and proceeded her journey.

-----------------

Kris waddled her way down the streets of the town, still oblivious to the massive amount of weight she’d gained from the past few days or, for that matter, the fact that her clothes have not been washed or changed from the amount of filth and stains that have been gathering. Her once trim and fit body had fattened up considerably.

Her belly was expanding at a rapid pace as it was filled with all sorts of fatty foods. Her top underneath her jacket had now ridden up past her belly button, as her stomach was growing bigger, rounder, softer and flabbier by the second. On top of that, her once small breasts have now swollen and beginning to overflow her tight top. And then down to the lower half of her body her ass, hips, and thighs have also gotten considerably chunkier as well; hugging her shorts tightly too.

Even Cyndaquil was packing quite a belly on it’s small body. But that didn’t bother Kris at all, or even question why she was very sluggish today, as she slowly waddled her way for route 32 where she learned this the route she needed to take; to get to Azalea Town and get her second badge. “I’ll visit Goldenrod City another time,” she thought strolling along through the woods, leaving a trail of sweat from her flabby body.

Along the way, Kris and her remarkable team faced many wild Pokémon and Trainers, not many gave Kris much trouble, as each win made her belch and fart from the victorious results. Later on, she came across a pier and tried her best not be imitated by the fishermen who had casted their lures there; some of which that were trainers too.

“I need *HUFF* a drink,” she panted rubbing her flabby elbow on her sweaty forehead. She pulled out a fizzy soda can from her bag and drank it down in one go, some spilling from the sides of her mouth, as the liquid ran down her neck and down towards her top’s turtleneck.

-----------------

By the time Kris arrived at another Pokémon Center, it was already night and thought it would be a better idea to rest and continue onwards tomorrow and of course have another big meal. But before Kris could open the door….
15533222222121111221212112111121.title: Off to Azalea Town we go!

choices: The next morning, it's quickly to Azalea, but finds a "small" problem there...
The next day, she's held up on the way, and catches a new pokemon.
155332222221211112212121121111212.content:
A stranger grabed Kris' attention, holding what appeared what appeared to be a severed pink tail. "Hey kid, how about a slowpoke tail?"

"Wh-whaaa...?"

Before Kris could fully grasp the what was going on, the man continued. "They're tasty and nutritious! And they're just 999999"

Kris' eyes grew wide in shock, she couldn't believe this guy. "You... You sir, are a sick, twisted man, and you should be ASHAMED of yourself!" Kris lost her temper, something about this situation seemed to really eat at her "It's bad enough you cut off the tail of a practically defenseless creature, but you're trying to sell it for HOW MUCH!? I couldn't even BEGIN to afford that! I don't think It's even physically possible to hold that much money!" her face turned red with rage, the young trainer stormed into the center, grumbling angrily.

"And here I thought kids these days were loaded..."

------------

As soon as the doors closed behind her however, her stomach gave an angry grumble of it's own.

"Ohhh... this talk of edible things made me even hungrier..." as she gave her pokemon to Nurse Joy, she ordered more food than usual. dozens of burgers, fries, sweets, plus extra for her pokemon, as well as lots to drink. As her pokemon were returned, Nurse Joy bowed her head politely, though the fact that she wore a clothespin on her nose as her eyes watered due to the terrible B.O. was lost on the messy girl, who was still fumming in anger.

"We hope to see you again soon... hopefully after you've bathed..."

------------

Deciding to eat with her companions instead of sitting at a table, Kris layed all the greasy food across the floor, and started to dig in, beginning with a large burger packed with various layers of food and condiments. Taking a large bite, some ketchup was squeezed out of the other end, and into her lap.

"Thish ish *burp* sho gud." As she spoke with her mouth full, dropping partially chewed food into her now ketchup stained lap, she was already starting to forget why she was mad. She just knew that there was a pile of food in front of her, and she and her pokemon were going to eat every last bit of it.

------------

Kris and her three partners layed on a pile of chewed up food and greasy wrappers, all of them stuffed to their limit with junk tood and soda. Kris moaned in a mix of pleasure and pain as she eased the pressure in her bloated gut with loud belches, with and occasional fart roaring out from behind. She failed to notice the people in the building were all staring at her, disturbed, and curios as to how just one girl and her four pokemon could cause such a massive mess.

Instead, she and her food stained friends had all started to drift into a blissfull sleep, as drool started to mix with the massive mess they were on. All while Kris continued to expel gas from both ends of her body. As she started to dream, her belly started to churn loudly as it started to digest all of the food contained within. At the moment it was causing her shirt to ride up, now almost completely exposed, but it soon started to slowly spread some of it's newly found fat all across the blue haired trainer's body.

"Zzz... That's *BRAAAAAP* it guys... show them... what we're *PHRRRRRRT* made of... *urp*"
155332222221211112212121121111212.title: Angry eating

choices: Kris' angrily eats her food and proceeds to investigate the town's strangeness
1553322222212111122121211211112121.content:
Getting kicked out from the Pokémon Center the very next day, was certainly not part of Kris' agenda; but somehow she managed to execute it swiftly. The Nurse Joy of the facility was disgusted to find the mess Kris and her team had managed to make during their short stay, with so much filth, crumbs and stains left around the place.

"AND DON'T COME BACK WHEN YOU LEARN SOME MANNERS YOUNG LADY!" shouted Nurse Joy, pushing the obese girl straight out of the building and closing the door behind her quickly as she could.

Dumbfounded by all of this, Kris scratched her sweaty armpit with utter confusion at what she just witnessed. "What's her problem?" Shrugging at the overdramatic nonsense that just occurred, Kris waddled down the lane towards her next destination; the Union Cave.

------------

The Union Cave may have been a very simple cave for everyone else who have travelled through it, however Kris wasn’t simply ‘everyone else’. She had a hard time walking through the rocky terrain and finding different paths to cross the many pools of water she encountered.

Kris was hoping to use Cyndaquil to help her see in the dark, but she knew it rather lay down and sleep peacefully in the dark.

Fighting the wild Pokémon and Pokémon trainers that inhabited the place was no easy task as well, if it wasn’t for the fact that Kris was reeking of a very foul stench that surrounded her flabby sweaty body. Any Pokémon or Trainer that tried to challenge her would soon meet a dreadful smell that went straight up their nostrils, immediately avoiding and evading any further contact with the stinky blue hair heroine.

------------

It may have taken all day, but finally Kris made it through the cave as it was already dark once more, taking another drink to quench her thirst and spilling it all over herself. She waddled her away straight to Azalea Town hoping to find the nearest Pokémon Center; however she was met with something else instead.

She noticed a strange black dressed person standing in-front of what seems to be a well, being curious she approached the man to find out why.

“Hello *URRP* there, what’s going on?” she asked politely.

The man looked back at Kris and was about to answer, but the horrid stench that had been following her immediately made contact with his nose and made his eyes tear up.

“J-J-Just standing guard… the well… the well is unsafe so I’m stand-standing guard,” he responded, trying to breathe.

Not wanting to continue bothering this man’s task, Kris wandered her way into town, just before letting out a long fart that made the man faint from the lack of fresh air to breath. “What a nice guy.”

As she staggered through town looking for the Pokémon Center, Kris’ eyes jumped at the mere sight of the Pokémon Gym as it was on the opposite side of the Center, “How convenient,” she thought. Wanting to check out the competition unlike before, Kris headed towards the Gym’s main entrance but she was stopped by… another man wearing black?

“Sorry kid, the gym’s under… maintenance, yeah,” the man stated with a sly grin on his face. Kris wasn’t very happy to find out about this, as she was hoping to get her badge as soon as possible. Just before she left the man’s sight, “Hey, have you heard about the Slowpoke Tail? I heard it’s rather tasty!”

SLAP!

------------

“How can I help you… miss?”

Rubbing her throbbing hand, Kris looked at Nurse Joy and said, “There’s some sickos out there.”
1553322222212111122121211211112121.title: Stench-O-Rama

choices: Kris teaches Team Rocket a lesson, starting with her
15533222222121111221212112111121211.content:
Being given her food by a reluctant Nurse Joy, Kris took a seat, and angrily shoved large handfuls of food into her mouth, chewing violently as she left the usual mess. Her frustration didn't completely subside this time around though, as she barely even bothered tasting her meal before swallowing. Her pokemon companions could barely keep up as they devored their share as fast as they could.

--------------

Nurse Joy had only just noticed the mess left behind by the time Kris had stormed out of the center, hearing the words "What in the world!?" before the door shut behind her.

Letting out a loud fart as she looked around, Kris couldn't help but notice something about the town seemed a bit... off...

Perhaps talking to everyone she could find and asking questions would shed a little light on the situation?

"All the slowpoke have disappeared from the town. The forest's protector may be angry with us... It may be a bad omen. We should stay in."

"Where have all the slowpoke gone? Are they out playing somewhere?"

"The slowpoke have disappeared from town... I heard their tails are being sold somewhere."

While most people had fled from her or passed out right in front of her, much to her confusion, she had found a handful of people who were too concerned as they mentioned the town's slowpokes going missing. She wanted to check one last place to the north of the town before jumping to conclusions. It was a house built somewhat differently then the rest, as it appeared more old fashioned...

--------------

An old man named Kurt and his grandchild were the only two living there, and apparently they made special pokeballs out of fruit. She could overhear the young girl's concern for the missing pokemon

"The slowpoke are gone... Were they taken away by bad people?" it was shortly after the young child noticed an odd scent. "Oh wow, grandpa, what is that awful smell!?"

--------------

Talking to the old man, he mentioned teaching a group named Team Rocket a lesson in pain before rushing off to the well. It took a while, being so out of shape and bloated from her earlier meal, but she managed to make it to the well.

"He *pant* must be crazy *pant* going in all *BURRRRP* alone... phew" Taking a moment to catch her breath, a puddle of sweat was quickly forming beneath her drenched body. "If it really is Team Rocket, there's no way he should go alone... *PHRRRRRRRT* That's better!" with the man guarding the entrance to the well gone, she headed in, hoping nothing had already gone wrong.

--------------

"Kurt! Are you okay!?" Kris got on her knees as she tried to help a fallen Kurt up onto his feet

"I took a tumble down the WELL. I slammed down hard on my
back, so I can't move. I guess it can't be helped. Young lady, if you could, show them how gutsy you are in my place!"

With a quick nod, the blue haired trainer went deeper into the well, wich seemed to be more of a cave from the inside. It didn't take long before she saw a few people dressed in black, seemingly acting as guards, when two of them covered their noses. "Wh-what is that smell! It smells like a-"

The sound of a loud BUUUUURP cut the grunt's words short, while another one with a familiar face noticed the source, recognizing Kris "Ack! I-it's that girl! I'm out of here!"

As the two ran off, the third grunt, a female, stayed behind and yelled at them. "Oh come on you two cowards! It's not like the smell is any worse than Proton's Koffing!" turning towards Kris, her face looked determined and ready for battle. "Well I'm not about to risk disobeying an order from him..."

Before the fight could start however, Kris' stomach could be heard begging for food, much to the grunt's amusment. "Hah, tell you what, I'll give you a few free slowpoke tails, you leave, and we'll pretend none of this ever happened..."
15533222222121111221212112111121211.title: All around town and into the well

choices: She finishes her food and fights the executive
155332222221211112212121121111212111.content:
The offer had made Kris very mad. Her face was no longer red from embarrassment, but instead from her anger. As she sent out her first pokemon, the grunt did the same, and a fight started.

The grunt's Zubat was barely any trouble. going down in a few hits from Cyndaquil, but her Ekans' had actually forced Kris to switch it out for Metapod when it managed it wraped itself around the small mouse pokemon. But a good tackle was all that was needed to finish the snake.

"I... I can't believe I lost to some stupid pig of a trainer!" A bit surprised, the grunt took a few steps back nervously, but wore a fake grin on her face to hide any fear as she lifted a large sack full of what was presumably the tails of the poor slowpoke. "Wh-whatever, I got more than enough tails for a good profit, I'm out... of..." she slowly turned around as she felt an ominous presence hovering behind her, "here...?" her eyes met with that of a sentient, toxic cloud. "... crap..."

Kris started to walk up to the the woman in a Team Rocket

-----------------

Kris dropped the now empty sack as she walked deeper into the well, leaving behind a stomach bloated, crying female member of Team Rocket laying on the ground, whimpering "So delicious... yet so *urp* gross..."

Determined to put a stop to the whole scheme, the young blue haired trainer continued down the path withing the cave-like well, hoping to find the person in charge. Not much further however, she could once again feel her stomach cry out for something to fill it, causing her to grab her stomach in pain as she fell to her knees. her body was heavily sweating, moreso than usual, slowly causing a puddle to form under her, growing wider the longer she stayed on top of it.

"S-so hungry... So hot... need food..." If she didn't eat food quick, she may start eating some tails out of desperation. She quickly placed her bag on the ground and opened it, she was glad she remembered to fill it with food. Sandwiches, chocolates, sodas, chips, and even a few pieces of pie wrapped in foil, all of which made her mouth poor drool down her chin in anticipation, dripping onto the bag. The bag was so full that a lot of the food was squished and crushed, and some of the chocolate had started to melt.

Placing a few portions of it all out for her three pokemon, she now sat on her rear, soaking it in the still growing puddle beneath her on the dirty rocky surface of the ground.

She couldn't stand the hunger anymore, she needed food now, thus the Team Rocket "Executive" would have to wait just a little bit longer.
155332222221211112212121121111212111.title: Emergency Lunch!

choices: Quilava is here and the Town is saved!
Cyndaquil doesn't evolve... but hey the town is saved!
1553322222212111122121211211112121112.content:
Luckily Kris’ ‘little’ snack didn’t get interrupted by anything inside the cave, as her Pokémon and her happily ate away with much delight. Belching loudly after eating the last remaining pie, Kris rubbed her swelling belly with her sticky hands and heaved her bulky body off from the dirt and continued along the path to find the leader of this Rocket team; the ‘Executive’.

Eventually her little walk came to an end, where she found quite possibly the man behind this operation. He was wearing the same uniform as the other Rocket members she had encountered but he had green hair and a black beret. Thinking she could get the jump on him with his back turned, Kris quietly tip-toed her way before she let out another fart that echoed across the cave. Hearing that noise, the man instantly turned around and glared at Kris with a sinister looking grin.

“What do we have here?” he questioned. Kris tried to stand her ground, while body jiggled around the place, expecting a battle to commence any second.

“I’m often labelled as the scariest and cruellest guy in Team Rocket…” He snickered. “Sorry piggy but this isn’t some sort of all you can eat buffet!”

“I’m here to stop you!” Kris shouted, once again spraying drool out from her furious mouth. “I won’t let you continuing harming these poor Slowpokes!”

Laughing at Kris’ display of heroics, the man simply clapped his hands. “I strongly urge you not to interfere with our business!” And just like that, he quickly grabbed a Poke-ball from his belt and threw out a Koffing.

In response Kris pulled out hers and threw out Cyndaquil to face his Pokémon.

-----------------

The fight was long and hard but Kris managed to beat the Executive with ease, despite her wheezing, panting and sweating from all the excitement.

“Argh! To have my plans ruined and defeated by some fat pig?!” Calling his defeated Pokémon back into its Poke-Ball; the man continued to stare back at Kris. “This isn’t over pig, we may have disappeared for the past three years but mark my words!” Throwing what seems to be another ball, before Kris could even react, the man disappeared in a puff of smoke.

“TEAM ROCKET IS BACK!” As his words echoed across the cave. Looking around the place, Kris couldn’t find any trace of the man or his friends as everyone had seemed to have vanished.

“We did it *URP* Cyndaquil!” Kris cheered. Expecting a snore or some sort of response, Kris received nothing instead. “Cyndaquil?” Facing towards her small cubby companion, it started to glow in white light.

“Oh my…”
1553322222212111122121211211112121112.title: She finishes her food and fights the executive

choices: Kris walks Kurt home the next day then runs into her rival on the way to the gym
It's straight to the gym for Kris, other things can wait for now...
15533222222121111221212112111121211121.content:
After a while, the glow had gotten brighter, only to eventually dim out. Only then could Kris see what effect it had on her little friend. What she saw lit up her eyes as she cheered with glee. It was visually clear that her partner had finally evolved, becoming what her pokedex called Quilava.

Now close to twice it's original size, Quilava's newly grown body appeared to of outgrown most of it's fat, though not completely. It's eyes were now visible to the rest of the world, and were currently being used to examin the rest of it's body. This examination was cut short however when it was suddenly pulled into a very tight hug from it's trainer.

10 seconds later however, a drop of sweat slid down the side of the blue haired girl's head as she heard a familiar noised, the sound of snoring. "I guess it's *BURP* safe to say you're still the same per*UUUURP*sonality-wise, huh?" She tried lifting her sleeping pokemon, but all that did was make her release multiple loud farts to echo throught the well. "I guess I'll have to keep you in your pokeball more often *BURP* now..."

------------------

Kris later arrived at the Pokemon Center with Kurt, seeing as this was a small town, there was apparently no hospital, so Kurt would have to rest his back here instead before going home. Nurse joy recognized Kris from earlier that day and started pushing her towards the exit, complaining angrily about her bad behavior and telling her to rest elsewhere.

"Now miss, is that any way to treat a hero?"

Joy paused and turned her head to the old man, a confused look covering her face as she probably started to think he had finally gone senile. "Hero?"

"Take a look outside, notice anything different?" Kurt directed the nurse's attention towards a window, where to her surprise, gave a clear view of some slowpoke, having been rescued from an unknown danger to the town. "Her manners may be lacking, but someone like her should be treated kindly for everything she did."

Turning back towards Kris in surprise, Nurse joy's expression soon turned cheery, before she grabbed her sticky hand and pulled her towards a table. "I guess Kurt is right, take a seat and I'll bring you whatever you want, on the house for tonight!"

Kris's eyes became as bright as fireworks upon hearing those words...

------------------

All eyes were on Kris as the last of her order was brought to her and her pokemon, dishes and crumbs already littering the area from what they had already eaten of it all so far. She literally orderd two of everything, much to Nurse Joy's dismay, but she knew Kris wouldn't be around much longer if she beat the gym from what was overheard from a conversation with her and Kurt...

Near Kris however was an odd egg the size of her head, resting on top of her bag. Apparently, the Pokemon Professor Elm sent his assistant to give it to her, in hopes that she would hatch it during her journey, and had caught up to her before any food arrived.

With such faith in her from Elm, the young trainer was ready to make massive amounts of progress by next morning, and was certain to reach her next destination as soon as possible once she beat the Azalea Town Gym.
15533222222121111221212112111121211121.title: A hero and her Quilava

choices: Kris' battles her way through the gym but has an 'accident'
Kris' battles her way through the gym without any problems
155332222221211112212121121111212111211.content:
Staying true to her word, Kris escorted Kurt back to his home while of course having another breakfast after eating breakfast at the Pokémon Center. “You certainly eat a lot Kris,” he laughed, sitting down watching her eat away with her granddaughter silently watched all of this from beside her grandfather. After eating all her food and setting off another long loud belch, Kris rubbed her ever-growing apron of a belly and said thanks for the meal before heading out.

Filled with more food and determination, Kris was about to leave before Kurt stopped her. "You know Kris, you handled yourself like a real hero at the Well yesterday. I like your style! I would be honoured to make Poke-Balls for a trainer like you. This is all I have now, but take it."

Collecting an oddly coloured ball from the counter, Kurt handed it to Kris who was marvelled by the design of the item. “That’s a Lure Ball, it’s most effective when catching Pokémon while fishing.”

"I make Balls from Apricorns. Collect them from trees and bring 'em to me. I'll make balls out of them."

Thanking Kurt for the gift, Kris waddled her way out and marched her way towards the town’s Pokémon Gym for her upcoming battle.

--------------------

Finally the time has come and there was nothing else that was gonna stop Kris from obtaining her second gym badge… so she thought. Just as she was about to push the door; out came someone she hasn’t seen for a while.

“LYRA!” shouted Kris.

Last time Kris encounter this vile girl, she was at the Bellsprout Tower sporting a new look with the same nasty attitude. Here… she had certainly ‘evolved’ from that time ago. Still sucking on a lollipop, Lyra stopped in her tracks and noticed who in-front of her was.

“Well well, fancy meeting you again,” she smirked. She certainly looked bigger than before but Kris was beating her at the moment with the chest department. “There’s been some gossip that some pig with blue hair managed to chase of the Rocket gang.” As Kris was about to respond, she unintentionally blasted out a small fart that made her moan slightly. “I guess the pig is true.” It had only been a few minutes and Kris was already boiling with frustration from all of this.

“As much as I would LOVE to battle you, I’m not gonna waste my time with someone who CLEARLY doesn’t have the time to beat the gym here.” Before anything else could be said, Kris was pushed aside once more by Lyra’s bouncing belly.

“Geez, what’s her problem…?” Kris said to herself, rubbing her sore belly.

Kris has a hard time getting through

Kris was pretty steamed after her run in with Lyra, but battling all the young bug catchers in the gym seemed to help calm her down. She especially enjoyed battling with a pair of twins, finding to two girls adorable. None of them seemed much of a challange though, especially with her newly evolved Quilava.

Bugsy, a young boy who was apparently an expert in the field of bug type pokemon, took one look at the Blue haired mess of a trainer, and noticed her odd appearance. amoung all the stickly food stains and drool, Kris was drenched in sweat from her journy to reach Bugsy, yet with a look of determination, clearly refused to be short on breath. The only thing that seemed to rival Kris' recently obtained slobbish behavior was her desire to win, something that seemed to rub off on her pokemon the same way their lack of manners rubbed off onto her.

This actually made Bugsy a lttle nervous, but he said what he always told all trainers before he'd fight them, and a battle soon followed.

--------------------

Walking out into the sun, Kris held up her newest badge infront of her face. It was almost disappointing how easy it was, but that just made progressing to the next destination easier. As an added bonus Mettapod evolved into Butterfry after it took out Bugsy's Kakuna.

After a mighty fart, her head finally realized just how much she was sweating, and she dropped onto her rear. "Whew, time to cool down..." opening her bag, she realized she was on her last soda, and the only thing accompanying it was the egg entrusted to her by Elm. "Guess we're stopping at the Pokemart before we *BURRRP* continue." And with that, she drank her last beverage in one go, spilling some of it down her chin as usual.

--------------------

Having to carry the egg in her arms now with how much she stuffed into her bag, Kris made took a deep breath, before farting again, then made her way into Ilex Forest. "Here I go. I'm not coming out unless it's on the *BURP* other side!"

Kris' mouth began to drool as she fantasized about all the various foods she'd get to eat once she finally made it to Goldenrod City. she knew the journey there would probably be a long one, but she felt it wou'd be worth it in the end.
1553322222212111122121211211112121112112.title: No accidents yet

choices: Kris summons her Butterfree and tells it to use string shot.
Kris suddenly... doesn't care about her clothes. (Another attitude change)
1553322222212111122121211211112121112112.content:
The Ilex Forest certainly lived up to its name sake, with so many overgrown trees that Kris couldn’t see the sky so clearly. Never the less, this wasn’t stopping Kris from making her way towards Goldenrod City, her mind still focusing on the delicious beverages, treats and meals that awaited her at that grand place. Drooling constantly at what she couldn’t wait to try, the egg she was carrying was getting soak from the ‘raindrops’ that fell from the fat trainer’s mouth.

"I wish I had a nice burger right now...” she dribbled. “I could go for a BBQ bacon burger… And a large order of fries, and... Some soda, and a... nice piece of hot apple pie."

With her head still filled with delicious thoughts, Kris didn’t expect the next thing that was about to happen. “WH-*URP*-OA!” Yelling and belching suddenly, Kris tripped on a stone and fell over onto the forest floor, with the Pokémon Egg flying forward from her hands and landing into some bushes. Lifting herself up and wiping the dirt on her already messy clothes, Kris noticed the egg was missing and started to panic. “OH NO! Where is it? Where is it?!” Sweating nervously at what she had done. Luckily there was no trainers or wild Pokémon nearby so Kris wouldn’t be interrupted, she hastily checked everywhere in her area to find the egg.

Until finally she found it well hidden in some bushes. “There you are,” she beamed. Bending down to collect the egg; until another unexpected thing occurred.

RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIPPPPPPPPPPPPP!

Freezing in place, Kris’ face instantly flared up with red and slowly moved her flabby arms and hands to her backside to confirm what she heard was true. “Please please please please…” she muttered to herself, hoping it was something else but unfortunately she was correct at what she felt. There on her shorts revealed a big massive ripped hole, with her sweaty chunky ass free for all to see; while still being held with her wedged panties.

Quickly picking up the egg, Kris sprinted her way through the forest as fast as she could; before anyone or Pokémon sees her like this. She waddled as fast as she could but, that didn’t last very long as she only made it barely at the forest’s lake, huffing and panting away.

Lying down in exhaustion, Kris admitted her defeat and rested for a while before thinking what to do next.

Bringing out her mildly obese flying bug pokemon, Kris instructed it to cover hole. with only a single confused grunt, it decided to comply, hiding her meaty posterior from the world with a mess of a sticky, string string like substance. the feeling of it on her skin felt weird, but surely nothing the trainer couldn't handle.

Morning had arrived and everything was going swimmingly for Kris; since her departure from the forest.

So she thought.

It came to no surprise, that not only did her flabby messy appearance startled everyone she met or encountered towards Goldenrod City, but now, they would also be greeted by her big, shapeless and uncontrollably jiggling ass; that was constantly reeking.

It never occurred to her why everyone was still avoiding her, but nevertheless she didn’t seem to care, which was growing more and more each passing second on her adventure. Even her Pokémon didn’t seem to care their mistress was mooning her rear 24 hour non-stop.

But hey, she was ‘winning’ battles a lot faster and easier than before, and boy did she have a lot money to spend now.

Scratching her ass in the middle of the city, Kris pondered on what to do next; since she finally arrived at her destination. Still exhausted from her ‘run’ through Route 34, Kris wasn’t sure if she needed/wanted a nice meal and drink to build up her stamina or face the gym leader. heading their seperate ways for now, Kris entered with her Pokemon out, and... got kicked out about an hour later after eating up the entire line of food thrice, almost a fourth time, and making it nearly impossible to breath in there with all her farts. "You're welcome to spend some of your coins on any of our prizes you might want before you go." He pointed Kris to two windows, before bowing apologetically and walking off. "Again, sorry to have to ask this of you..."

I'll probably visit the gym shortly." walking up to the windows, the young trainer noticed the woman on the other side seemed to have a clothespin on her nose...

1553322222212111122121211211112121112112.title: Jackpot!!! That's some dumb luck.

"Ummm. I'll pick...*BUUUUUUURP* ...that one."

Not a lot of thought went into Kris' decsion. She just pick the one that looked the cutest. Obviously a match for her, right? It huddled up to her for warmth, seemingly unaffected by the smell.

"Heh...you're just *PHRRRRRT* adorable, aren't you? Just...just...like...me~!

It was strange, but it's almost like she was changing on the spot...mentally, anyway. She looked the same as ever.

On the way to the gym, she carried herself with a newfound swagger. The way she walked, she seemed to be showing off her new body, her bare ass waving in the wind as it poked through the massive hole in her shorts that certainly wasn't getting any smaller.

A police officer spotted her on her way. He had to take care of this. He braved the unbearable stench as he got closer, and got her attention.

1553322222212111122121211211112121112112.content:
Kris strutted into the gym, and as she dropped the now licked clean chocolate wrapper, did what her mind believed was a pose that made her look adorable as her new Dratini cuddled around her thick neck licke a scarf.

Her face and hand now freshly coated in gooey chocolate, on top of the already existing mess that she had obtained since she started her journey, all she got was stares from the four trainers within the gym, each one with a different emotion.
